spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The aboleth's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deva makes two attacks.

action.name: Celestial Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) radiant damage. On a hit, the target can't make opportunityattacks against the deva until the beginning of the target's next turn.

bonus.name: Bonus
entries: Entries

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifice
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrall that the thrall can see hits an aboleth with an attack, the thrall can make itself the target of the attack instead.

legendary.name: Legendary action
entries: Entries for legendary action

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The aboleth's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the aboleth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, one of its eyes flashes with green light and then turns dull black. Once all 3 of its eyes are black, it is blind beyond the range of its blindsight until it finishes a long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aboleth attacks three times with its tentacle.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. The aboleth can choose instead to deal 0 damage. Then, if the target is a creature, it makes a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it contracts a disease called the Sea Change. On a success, it is immune to this disease for 24 hours. While affected by this disease, the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws. After 1 hour, the target grows gills, it can breathe water, its skin becomes slimy, and it begings to suffocate if it goes 12 hours without being immersed in water for at least 1 hour. This disease can be removed with a disease-removing spell cast with at least a 4th-level spell slot, and it ends 24 hours after the aboleth dies.

action.name: Slimy Cloud (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: While underwater, the aboleth exudes a cloud of inky slime in a 30-foot-radius sphere. Each non-aboleth creature in the area when the cloud appears makes a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The slime extends around corners, and the area is heavily obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current dissipates the cloud.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The aboleth moves up to its swim speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Telepathic Summon
entries: Once creature within 90 feet makes a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it must use its reaction, if available, to move up to its Speed toward the aboleth by the most direct route that avoids hazards, not avoiding opportunity attacks. This is a magical effect that counts the target as being {@condition charmed}.

legendary.name: Baleful Charm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The aboleth targets one creature within 60 feet that has contracted Sea Change. The target makes a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is magically {@condition dominated|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} by the aboleths until the aboleth dies. The target can repeat this saving throw every 24 hours and when it takes damage from the aboleth or the aboleth's allies. While {@condition dominated|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} in this way, the target can communicate telepathically with the aboleth over any distance.

legendary.name: Soul Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the aboleths takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the aboleths takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

legendary.name: Elite Recovery (While Bloodied)
entries: The aboleth ends one negative effect currently affecting it. It can use this action as long as it has at least 1 hit point, even while it is unable to take actions.

legendary.name: Look Upon My Works (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: Each creature within 90 feet makes a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature sees a fragmentary vision of the aboleth's memories, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) psychic damage. After taking the damage, the creature forgets the vision, but it may learn one piece of lore about the aboleth.

legendary.name: Lunging Attack (While Bloodied)
entries: The aboleth moves up to its swim speed without provoking opportunity attacks and makes a tentacle attack.

trait.name: Sea Changed
entries: The aboleth thrall can breathe water and air, but must bathe in water for 1 hour for every 12 hours it spends dry or it begins to suffocate. It is magically {@condition charmed} by the aboleth.

action.name: Poison Ink Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2} slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifice
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrall that the thrall can see hits an aboleth with an attack, the thrall can make itself the target of the attack instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Divine Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d8} radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Energy (1/Day)
entries: The deva touches a creature other than itself. If the target is unwilling, the deva makes an attack roll with a +8 bonus. The deva can choose to magically heal 60 hit points of damage and end any of the following effects on the target: {@condition blinded}, any curse, {@condition deafened}, any disease, or {@condition poisoned}. Alternatively, the deva can choose to deal 60 radiant damage to the target.

action.name: Change Form
entries: The deva magically transforms into a beast or humanoid or back into its true form. It retains its deva statistics, including speech and telepathy, except that it has the size, movement modes, and traits of its new form.

action.name: Divine Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d8} radiant damage.

Alternatively, the deva can choose to deal 60 radiant damage to the target.

action.name: Change Form
entries: The deva magically transforms into a beast or humanoid or back into its true form. It retains its deva statistics, including speech and telepathy, except that it has the size, movement modes, and traits of its new form.

action.name: Consume Life Energy (1/Day)
entries: The deva feasts on the departing life energy of a humanoid within 5 feet. The target must have been slain within the last hour. The deva magically gains temporary hit points equal to half the dead creature's maximum hit points. These hit points last until depleted. Only a spell cast with a 9th-level spell slot can raise the corpse from the dead.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The planetar's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Champion of Truth
entries: The planetar automatically detects lies. Additionally, it cannot lie.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The planetar has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The planetar attacks twice with its flaming sword.

action.name: Flaming Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6} slashing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) ongoing fire or radiant damage (the planetar's choice). A creature can use an action to extinguish this holy flame on itself or a creature within 5 feet.

action.name: Heavenly Bolt
entries: The planetar fires a lightning bolt in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line makes a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 ({@damage 16d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half damage on a success.

action.name: Heal (2/Day)
entries: The planetar touches a creature other than itself, magically healing 60 hit points of damage and ending any of the following effects on the target: {@condition blinded}, any curse, {@condition deafened}, any disease, or {@condition poisoned}.

bonus.name: Awe-Inspiring Gaze (Gaze)
entries: The planetar targets a creature within 90 feet. The target makes a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. If the target makes its saving throw, it is immune to any angel's Awe-Inspiring Gaze for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Protective Parry
entries: When a creature within 5 feet would be hit with a melee attack, the planetar applies disadvantage to the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The solar's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 25}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Champion of Truth
entries: The solar automatically detects lies. Additionally, it cannot lie.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the solar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, it wards itself with its sword, which dissolves into glowing particles of light. The solar's sword re-forms at the beginning of its next turn. Until then, the solar has no sword and can't use Forceful Parry, attack with its holy sword, or use Legendary Resistance.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The solar has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The solar attacks twice with its holy sword.

action.name: Holy Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9} slashing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Column of Flame
entries: Flame erupts in a 10-foot-radius, 30-foot-tall cylinder centred on a point the solar can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage and 21 ({@damage 6d6}) radiant damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Forceful Parry (While Bloodied)
entries: When a creature misses the solar with a melee attack, the solar's parrying sword sparks with energy. The attacker takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) lightning damage and makes a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and falls {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The solar magically teleports up to 120 feet to an empty space it can see.

legendary.name: Heal (3/Day)
entries: The solar touches a creature other than itself, magically healing 60 hit points of damage and ending any of the following effects on the target: {@condition blinded}, any curse, {@condition deafened}, any disease, or {@condition poisoned}.

legendary.name: Deafening Command (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The solar speaks an echoing command. Each creature of the solar's choice within 30 feet that can hear the solar and understands a language makes a {@dc 24} Charisma saving throw. Each creature that succeeds on the saving throw takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) thunder damage. Each creature that fails its saving throw immediately takes a certain action, depending on the solar's command. This counts as the targets being magically {@condition charmed}.

items.name: Abase Yourself
entries: The creature falls prone.

items.name: Approach
entries: The creature must use its reaction, if available, to move up to its Speed toward the solar by the most direct route that avoids hazards, not avoiding opportunity attacks.

items.name: Flee
entries: The creature must use its reaction, if available, to move up to its Speed away from the solar, not avoiding opportunity attacks.

items.name: Surrender
entries: The creature drops anything it is holding.

trait.name: Spell-Created
entries: The DC for {@spell dispel magic|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} to destroy this creature is 19.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the armour is indistinguishable from normal armour.

trait.name: Enchanted Armour
entries: Any animated armour may possess one of the following traits:

items.name: Flaming
entries: The armour is immune to fire damage, and any damage it deals is fire damage.

items.name: Sentinel
entries: The armour's creator receives a mental alarm if the armour is destroyed.

items.name: Spell Imbued
entries: The creator stores a spell in the armour (typically a spell with a level equal to or lower than the armour's CR) that triggers once when certain conditions are met. For instance, the armour might {@spell levitate|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} before attacking.

items.name: Talkative
entries: The armour can pose riddles or answer questions as if it were a sentient creature.

action.name: Weapon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2} bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, depending on weapon.

trait.name: Spell-Created
entries: The DC for {@spell dispel magic|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} to destroy this creature is 19.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the sword is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

items.name: Flaming

items.name: Sentinel

entries: The sword can pose riddles or answer questions as if it were a sentient creature.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1} slashing damage.

trait.name: Spell-Created
entries: The DC for {@spell dispel magic|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} to destroy this creature is 19.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the rug is indistinguishable from a normal rug.

trait.name: Enchanted Rug
entries: Any animated rug may possess one of the following traits:

items.name: Flaming
entries: The rug is immune to fire damage, and any damage it deals is fire damage.

items.name: Sentinel
entries: The rug's creator receives a mental alarm if the rug is destroyed.

items.name: Spell Imbued

items.name: Talkative
entries: The rug can pose riddles or answer questions as if it were a sentient creature.

action.name: Smother
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h} The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and can't breathe. When the rug is dealt damage while it is grappling, it takes half the damage (rounded down) and the other half is dealt to the {@condition grappled} target. The rug can only have one creature {@condition grappled} at once.

action.name: Squeeze
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by the rug takes 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Bludgeoning Weakness
entries: When the statue takes more than 10 bludgeoning damage from one attack, it falls prone.

trait.name: Spell-Created
entries: The DC for {@spell dispel magic|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} to destroy this creature is 19.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the statue is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

trait.name: Enchanted Statue
entries: Any animated statue may possess one of the following traits:

items.name: Flaming
entries: The statue is immune to fire damage, and any damage it deals is fire damage.

items.name: Sentinel
entries: The statue's creator receives a mental alarm if the statue is destroyed.

items.name: Spell Imbued
entries: The creator stores a spell in the statue (typically a spell with a level equal to or lower than the statue's CR) that triggers once when certain conditions are met. For instance, the statue might {@spell levitate|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} before attacking.

items.name: Talkative
entries: The statue can pose riddles or answer questions as if it were a sentient creature.

action.name: Smash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludeoning damage.

action.name: Spit Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 2} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3} slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the ankheg can't use its claws on anyone else.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature {@condition grappled} by the ankheg. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3} slashing damage. If this damage kills the target, the ankheg severs its head.

action.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
entries: The ankheg spits a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide stream of acid. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage on a failure or half damage on a success. If the ankheg has a {@condition grappled} target, it instead bathes the target in acid, dealing 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage with no saving throw only to that target.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3} slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the ankheg can't use its claws on anyone else.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature {@condition grappled} by the ankheg. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3} slashing damage. If this damage kills the target, the ankheg severs its head.

action.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
entries: The ankheg spits a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide stream of acid. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage on a failure or half damage on a success. If the ankheg has a {@condition grappled} target, it instead bathes the target in acid, dealing 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage with no saving throw only to that target.

legendary.name: Acid Glob (1/1)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3} acid damage.

legendary.name: Burrowing Ambush (1/1, 1/Day)
entries: The ankheg burrows up to its burrowing speed without provoking opportunity attacks, and then resurfaces. If an enemy is within its reach, it makes a claw attack with advantage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2} slashing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2} slashing damage, and the target makes a {@dc 12} Strength check. On a failure, it is knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is already {@condition prone}, the ankheg can instead move up to half its Speed, dragging the target with it.

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8} acid damage.

trait.name: Fiery Aura
entries: A creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of one or more azers takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dime light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3} bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Heat Metal
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 ft., one creature wearing or holding a metal object. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8} fire damage. If a creature is holding the object and suffers damage, it makes a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, dropping the object on a failure.

bonus.name: Fire Step
entries: While standing in fire, the azer can magically teleport up to 90 feet to a space within fire.

trait.name: Fiery Aura
entries: A creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of one or more azers takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dime light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The azer attacks with its returning hammer and uses Bonfire if available.

action.name: Returning Hammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4} bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. The azer's hammer returns to its hand after it's thrown.

action.name: Bonfire (3/Day)
entries: A 5-foot-square space within 60 feet catches fire. A creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage when it enters this area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. A creature can use an action to extinguish this fire.

bonus.name: Fire Step
entries: While standing in fire, the azer can magically teleport up to 90 feet to a space within fire.

monster.name: Banshee
languages: the languages it spoke in life

trait.name: Death Howl
entries: When reduced to 0 hit points, the banshee uses Baleful Wail.

trait.name: Detect Life
entries: The banshee magically senses the general direction of living creatures up to 5 miles away.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The banshee can move through creatures and objects. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A banshee doesn't require air, sustenance, or sleep.

trait.name: Unquiet Spirit
entries: If killed in combat, the banshee returns on the anniversary of its death. It can be permanently put to rest only by finding and casting {@spell remove curse|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} on its grave or by righting whatever wrong was done to it.

action.name: Presage Death
entries: The banshee targets a creature within 60 feet that can hear it, predicting its doom. The target makes a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) psychic damage and is magically cursed for 1 hour. While cursed in this way, the target has disadvantage on saving throws against the banshee's Baleful Wail.

action.name: Baleful Wail
entries: The banshee shrieks. All living creatures within 30 feet of it that can hear it make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) psychic damage. If the creature is cursed by the banshee, it drops to 0 hit points instead.

reaction.name: Wounded Warning
entries: When the banshee takes damage from a creature within 60 feet, it uses Presage Death on the attacker.

action.name: Stone Gaze (Gaze)
entries: The basilisk targets a creature within 60 feet. The target makes a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the target magically begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. A {@spell lesser restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} spell ends this effect. At the beginning of the basilisk's next turn, if still {@condition restrained}, the target repeats the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified}. This petrification can be removed with {@spell greater restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or similar magic, or with basilisk venom.

action.name: Venomous Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2} piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

reaction.name: Stone Glance
entries: If a creature within 60 feet that the basilisk can see hits the basilisk with an attack, the basilisk uses Stone Gaze on the attacker.

trait.name: Serpentine
entries: The behir can move through a space as narrow as 5 feet wide, vertical or horizontal, at full speed, without squeezing.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The behir can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The behir makes a bite attack and then a constrict attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d12 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the behir, and the behir has not swallowed anyone else, the target is swallowed. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover from attacks from outside the behir, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns.
If a swallowed creature deals 30 or more damage to the behir in a single turn, or if the behir dies, the behir vomits up the creature.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) and {@condition restrained} while {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The behir breathes a line of lightning 5 feet wide and 20 feet long. Creatures in the area make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 ({@damage 16d6}) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Vengeful Breath (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: When struck by a melee attack, the behir immediately recharges and uses Lightning Breath, including the attacker in the area of effect.

action.name: Vaulting Leap
entries: The boggard jumps up to its Speed horizontally and half its Speed vertically without provoking opportunity attacks. If it's within 5 feet of a creature at the end of this movement, it may make a melee spear attack against that creature with advantage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Vaulting Leap

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}The target must make a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the boggard pulls the target up to 10 feet, or knocks the target {@condition prone}, or forces the target to drop one item it is holding (boggard's choice).

action.name: Parting Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage. On a hit, the boggard may jump up to its Speed horizontally and half is Speed vertically without provoking opportunity attacks.

action.name: Incite Frenzy (1/Day)
entries: Each boggard and frog with a Bite attack within 60 feet may use its reaction to make a Bite attack.

action.name: Earthshaking Croak (1/Day)
entries: Each non-frog and non-boggard creature within 30 feet makes a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) thunder damage and falling {@condition prone} on a failure, or taking half damage on a success.

action.name: Summon Frog Guardians (1/Day)
entries: The boggard magically summons two Medium frog guardians, which wriggle from the ground in an empty space within 30 feet. They follow the boggard's orders and disappear after 1 minute. They have the statistics of a {@creature boggard|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} except that they have Intelligence 2, have no spear attack, and can make a bite attack as part of their Vaulting Leap.

action.name: Strangle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature that is surprised, {@condition grappled} by the bugbear, or that can't see the bugbear. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pulled 5 feet towards the bugbear and is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the bugbear automatically hits with the Strangle attack and the target can't breathe.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage damage, or 12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) piercing damage if the target is a creature that is surprised or that can't see the bugbear.

action.name: Stealthy Sneak
entries: The bugbear moves up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can then attempt to hide.

action.name: Strangle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature that is surprised, {@condition grappled} by the kech, or that can't see the kech. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pulled 5 feet towards the kech and is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the kech automatically hits with the Strangle attack and the target can't breathe.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage damage, or 12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) piercing damage if the target is a creature that is surprised or that can't see the kech.

action.name: Stealthy Sneak
entries: The kech moves up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can then attempt to hide.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bugbear chief makes two attacks.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage damage, or 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage if the target is a creature that is surprised or that can't see the bugbear.

action.name: Move Out (1/Day)
entries: The bugbear and creatures of its choice within 30 feet move up to half their Speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Steely Hide
entries: If a creature targets the bulette with a melee attack using a non-magical weapon and rolls a natural 1 on the attack roll, the weapon breaks.

action.name: Leap (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The bulette leaps up to half its Speed horizontally and half its Speed vertically without provoking opportunity attacks, and can land in a space containing one or more creatures. Each creature in its space when it lands makes a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 1d8 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and being knocked {@condition prone} on a failure. On a success, the creature takes half damage and is pushed 5 feet to a space of its choice. If that space is occupied, the creature is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Burrow
entries: The bulette burrows under the ground without provoking opportunity attacks, moves up to its burrow speed, and then resurfaces in an unoccupied space. If it is within 5 feet of a creature, it then makes a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d12 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Jaw Clamp (1/Day)
entries: When an attacker within 5 feet of the bulette misses it with a melee attack, the bulette makes a bite attack against the attacker. On a hit, the attacker is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the {@condition grappled} creature is {@condition restrained}, and the only attack the bulette can make is a bite against the {@condition grappled} creature.

reaction.name: Hard Carapace (1/Day)
entries: After taking damage from an attack, the bulette lies down and closes its eyes, protecting all vulnerable spots. Until the beginning of its next turn, its AC becomes 21 and it has advantage on saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cambion makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Black Iron Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage, and the target takes a wound that deals 5 ({@damage 1d10}) ongoing slashing damage. A creature can end the ongoing damage by staunching the wound as an action or by giving the target magical healing.

action.name: Fire Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Fiery Escape (1/Day)
entries: The cambion magically creates a fiery portal to the realm of its fiendish parent. The portal appears in an empty space within 5 feet. The portal lasts until the end of the cambion's next turn or until it passes through the portal. No one but the cambion can pass through the portal; anyone else that enters its space takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

bonus.name: Fell Charm
entries: The cambion targets one creature within 30 feet. The target makes a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is magically {@condition charmed} by the cambion for 1 day. The effect ends if the cambion or a cambion's ally harms the target, or if the cambion commands it to take a suicidal action. While {@condition charmed}, the target regards the cambion as a trusted friend an is an ally of the cambion. If the target makes a successful saving throw or the effect ends, the target is immune to this cambion's Fell Charm for 24 hours.

bonus.name: Command
entries: The cambion gives an order to an ally within 60 feet that can hear it. If the ally has a reaction available, it can use it to follow the cambion's order, either taking an action or moving up to its Speed.

bonus.name: Shapeshift
entries: The cambion magically changes its form to that of any humanoid creature it has seen before, or back into its true form. While shapeshifted, its statistics are unchanged except that it has no armour or equipment, can't use its black iron blade, and can fly only if it is in a form with wings. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The centaur attacks with its pike and its hooves.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If this attack deals damage, the centaur's movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from the target for the rest of the centaur's turn.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Deadeye Shot (1/Day)
entries: The centaur makes a shortbow attack with advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tauric attacks with its gore and its hooves.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) damage if the tauric moved at least 30 feet towards the target before the attack.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If this attack deals damage, the tauric's movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from the target for the rest of the tauric's turn.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Deadeye Shot (1/Day)
entries: The tauric makes a shortbow attack with advantage.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: The chimera can take three reactions per round, but not more than one per turn.

trait.name: Three Heads
entries: The chimera has advantage on Perception checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition debilitated|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}, and knocked unconscious, and it can't be flanked.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the chimera's heads is asleep, the others are awake.

action.name: Headbutt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage, or 14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4}) slashing damage against a {@condition prone} target.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon head breathes fire in a 15-foot cone. Creatures in the area make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Tail Swipe (1/Day)
entries: If a creature within 5 feet hits the chimera with a melee attack, the attacker is battered by the chimera's tail. The attacker makes a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it takes 9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and is pushed 10 feet from the chimera and knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Winged Charge (1/Day)
entries: If a creature the chimera can see hits it with a ranged attack, the chimera leaps off the ground and moves up to its fly speed towards the attacker. If within range, the chimera then makes a headbutt attack against the attacker.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The chimera uses its Bite attack.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The chimera uses its Claw attack.

entries: When one of the chimera's heads is asleep, the others are awake.

trait.name: Faerie Nature
entries: The chimera's form cannot be changed through {@spell polymorph|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or similar magic.

entries: When one of the chimera's heads is asleep, the others are awake.

action.name: Nightmare Trample
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bat Bite

action.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The hellhound head breathes fire in a 15-foot cone. Creatures in the area make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Tail Swipe (1/Day)
entries: If a creature within 5 feet hits the chimera with a melee attack, the attacker is battered by the chimera's tail. The attacker makes a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it takes 9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and is pushed 10 feet from the chimera and knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Winged Charge (1/Day)
entries: If a creature the chimera can see hits it with a ranged attack, the chimera leaps off the ground and moves up to its fly speed towards the attacker. If within range, the chimera then makes a headbutt attack against the attacker.

legendary.name: Bite

legendary.name: Claw

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the chimera's heads is asleep, the others are awake.

monster.name: Chuul
languages: understands deep speech but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The chuul can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Detect Magic
entries: The chuul senses a magical aura around any visible creature or object within 120 feet that bears magic.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: If the chuul is has a creature {@condition grappled}, it uses its tentacle on that creature. It then makes two pincer attacks.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). When carrying a {@condition grappled} creature, the chuul can move at full speed. A pincer that is being uses to grapple a creature can be used only to attack that creature.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: A {@condition grappled} creature makes a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition staggered|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the stagger on a success.

monster.name: Spell-Warped Chuul
languages: understands deep speech but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The chuul can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Detect Magic
entries: The chuul senses a magical aura around any visible creature or object within 120 feet that bears magic.

trait.name: Spell-Warped
entries: The chuul has one of the following traits:

items.name: Absorb Magic
entries: The chuul has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. Whenever the chuul successfully saves against a spell or magical effect, it magically gains 5 temporary hit points. While these temporary hit points last, the chuul's pincer attacks deal an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) force damage.

items.name: King-Sized Claw
entries: One of the chuul's pincers deals 18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage on a successful hit. A creature {@condition grappled} by this pincer makes ability checks to escape the grapple with disadvantage.

items.name: Rune Drinker
entries: Whenever the chuul takes damage from a magic weapon, until the start of the chuul's next turn attacks made with that weapon have disadvantage, and the chuul gains a +4 bonus to AC.

items.name: Sparking Wand
entries: A wand of lightning bolts adorns the chuul's carapace. A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet must make a successful {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 8 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage. As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the chuul can grab the wand by making a successful {@dc 14} Athletics or Sleight of Hand check. A creature that fails this check must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: If the chuul is has a creature {@condition grappled}, it uses its tentacle on that creature. It then makes two pincer attacks.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). When carrying a {@condition grappled} creature, the chuul can move at full speed. A pincer that is being uses to grapple a creature can be used only to attack that creature.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: A {@condition grappled} creature makes a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition staggered|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the stagger on a success.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: When motionless, the cloaker is indistinguishable from a black cloak or similar cloth or leather article.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: The cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks while in bright light.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). If the cloaker has advantage against the target, the cloaker attaches to the target's head, and the target is {@condition blinded} and suffocating. Until this grapple ends, the cloaker automatically hits the {@condition grappled} creature with this attack. When the cloaker is dealt damage while grappling, it takes half the damage (rounded down) and the other half is dealt to the {@condition grappled} target. The cloaker can have only one creature {@condition grappled} at once.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage, and the creature makes a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition poisoned} until the end of the cloaker's next turn.

action.name: Moan
entries: The cloaker emits a bone-chilling moan. Each non-aberration creature within 60 feet that can hear its moan makes a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} of the cloaker until the end of the cloaker's next turn. When a creature succeeds on this saving throw, it becomes immune to the cloaker's Moan for 24 hours.

action.name: Phantasms (1/Day)
entries: The cloaker magically creates flickering illusions of itself in its space. Attacks on it have disadvantage. This effect ends after 1 minute, when the cloaker enters an area of bright light, or when it successfully grapples a creature.

reaction.name: Reactive Tail
entries: When hit or missed with a melee attack, the cloaker makes a tail attack against the attacker.

reaction.name: Angry Moan
entries: When the cloaker takes damage, it uses Moan.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: When motionless, the ray is indistinguishable from a patch of sand.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: The ray has disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks while in bright light.

Until this grapple ends, the ray automatically hits the {@condition grappled} creature with this attack. When the ray is dealt damage while grappling, it takes half the damage (rounded down) and the other half is dealt to the {@condition grappled} target. The ray can have only one creature {@condition grappled} at once.

trait.name: Clockwork Sights
entries: The bolt-thrower does not have disadvantage on attack rolls when making ranged attacks within 5 feet of a hostile creature.

trait.name: Rooted
entries: The bolt-thrower can use a bonus action to anchor itself to or detach itself from a surface. While anchored, the bolt-thrower's Speed is 0, and a {@dc 20} Strength check is required to detach it. A bolt-thrower cannot use its heavy crossbow unless it is anchored.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bolt-thrower attacks once with each of its crossbows.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the sentinel is indistinguishable from normal armour.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sentinel attacks three times.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Calculated Sweep
entries: The sentinel makes a melee attack against each creature of its choice within 10 feet. On a critical hit, the target makes a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

bonus.name: Overclock (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The sentinel takes the Dash action.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The sentinel adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.

action.name: Needle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/80 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Photograph
entries: The gear spider stores a black and white image of what it can see. The gear spider can hold up to 10 images at a time. Retrieving the image storage device inside the gear spider requires 1 minute. Once the device is accessed, viewing a stored image requires a {@dc 12} Investigation check to make out any details.

action.name: Crush
entries: The crusher moves up to its Speed in a straight line. While doing so, it can attempt to enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the crusher attempts to enter a creature's space, the creature makes a {@dc 17} Dexterity or Strength saving throw (the creature's choice). If the creature succeeds and a Strength saving throw, the crusher's movement ends for the turn. If the creature succeeds at a Dexterity saving throw, the creature may use its reaction, if available, to move up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. The first time on the crusher's turn that it enters a creature's space, the creature is knocked {@condition prone} and takes 50 ({@damage 10d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. A creature is {@condition prone} while in the crusher's space.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the crusher moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack, the attack deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Overclock (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The crusher takes the Dash action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target makes a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw against being {@condition petrified}. On a failure, the target is {@condition restrained} as it begins to turn to stone. A {@spell lesser restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} spell ends this effect. If still {@condition restrained}, the creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Frenzy (1/Day)
entries: When attacked by a creature it can see within 20 feet, the cockatrice moves up to half its Speed and makes a bite attack against that creature.

trait.name: Aquatic
entries: The coralfish can only breathe underwater.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target makes a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw against being {@condition petrified}. On a failure, the target is {@condition restrained} as it begins to turn into a brightly-coloured coral statue. A {@spell lesser restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} spell ends this effect. If still {@condition restrained}, the creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Frenzy (1/Day)
entries: When attacked by a creature it can see within 20 feet, the coralfish moves up to half its Speed and makes a bite attack against that creature.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The couatl's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Lawful Good
entries: The couatl radiates a Lawful and Good aura.

trait.name: Nondetection
entries: The couatl can't be targeted or perceived by divination magic.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the couatl can't constrict other targets, and the couatl has advantage on attacks against the target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target makes a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours. The target is {@condition dazed|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the {@condition poisoned} condition ends or a creature uses an action to shake the target into their senses.

action.name: Heal (1/Day)
entries: The couatl touches a creature, magically healing 20 hit points of damage and ending the {@condition poisoned} condition on that creature.

action.name: Shapeshift
entries: The couatl magically changes its form to resemble that of a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. If its form is humanoid, it is equipped with clothing and a weapon. While shapeshifted, its statistics are the same except that it can't use Constrict or Shielding Wing and it may gain a swim speed of 60 or lose its fly speed if appropriate to its new form. If it's a beast, it can use its bite attack. If it's a humanoid, it may make a weapon attack, which functions identically to its bite attack.

reaction.name: Shielding Wing
entries: When the couatl or a creature within 5 feet is attacked, the couatl can interpose a wing and impose disadvantage on the attack.

trait.name: Panicked Rage
entries: While a cyclops is {@condition frightened} and the source of its fear is in sight, it makes attack rolls with advantage instead of disadvantage.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The cyclops makes all ranged attacks with disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyclops makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 ft. (see Poor Depth Perception), one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Thick Skulled (1/Day)
entries: The cyclops can end one condition on itself that was imposed through a failed Wisdom saving throw.

reaction.name: Big Windup
entries: When a creature hits the cyclops with a melee attack, the cyclops readies a powerful strike against its attacker. The cyclops has advantage on the next club attack it makes against the attacker before the end of its next turn.
