action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 90 ft. (see Poor Depth Perception), one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) piercing damage. The target makes a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the merclops pulls the target up to 30 feet toward the merclops.

bonus.name: Thick Skulled (1/Day)
entries: The merclops can end one condition on itself that was imposed through a failed Wisdom saving throw.

reaction.name: Big Windup
entries: When a creature hits the merclops with a melee attack, the merclops readies a powerful strike against its attacker. The merclops has advantage on the next club attack it makes against the attacker before the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The darkmantle can't use blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the darkmantle is indistinguishable from rock.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The darkmantle uses Darkness Aura and makes a crush attack.

action.name: Darkness Aura
entries: A 15-foot-radius area of magical darkness emanates from the darkmantle, spreading around corners and moving with it. Darkvision and natural light can't penetrate it. If the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a 2nd-level spell or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled. The darkness aura lasts for 10 minutes or until the darkmantle takes damage.

action.name: Crush
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). If the darkmantle made the attack with advantage, it attaches to the target's head, and the target is {@condition blinded} and can't breathe. While grappling, the darkmantle can only attack the {@condition grappled} creature but has advantage on its attack roll. The darkmantle's speed becomes 0, and it moves with its target.

monster.name: Demilich
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but doesn't speak

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the demilich makes a saving throw against an effect that deals half damage on a success, it takes no damage on a success and half damage on a failure.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, one of the five tiny warding gems set on its forehead or teeth shatters.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A demilich doesn't require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Devour Soul
entries: The demilich targets one creature within 120 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a success, or if all the large soul gems on the demilich's skull are occupied, the creature takes 40 necrotic damage, and the demilich regains the same number of hit points. If the target fails its saving throw and there is at least one unoccupied soul gem on the demilich's skull, the demilich regains 40 hit points, and the target dies instantly. Its soul is trapped in a soul gem on the demilich's skull, visible as a tiny, creature-shaped mote of light. While its soul is trapped, a creature can't be restored to life by any means. A soul that remains in a soul gem for 30 days is destroyed forever. If the demilich is defeated and a soul gem crushed, the creature is restored to life if its body is within 100 miles. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw against this effect is immune to it for 24 hours.
A demilich begins combat with one or two empty soul gems.

legendary.name: Cranial Transposition
entries: The dust surrounding the demilich falls to the ground. The demilich and a non-magical, unattended skull within 30 feet teleport, switching places. Until the demilich moves or attacks, it is indistinguishable from a non-magical sjull, and the dust composing the demilich's wraithlike body doesn't reform around it.

legendary.name: Dust Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dust of the demilich's body swirls in a 30-foot radius around the demilich. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. The demilich then moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Ringing Laugh (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 60 feet that can hear the demilich makes a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition frightened} of the demilich until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Telekinesis
entries: The demilich targets a Huge or smaller creature or an object weighing up to 1,000 pounds within 60 feet. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw. Otherwise, the demilich moves the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including up. If another creature or object stops the target's movement, both take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage. At the end of this movement, the target falls if it is still in the air, taking falling damage as normal.

monster.name: Demilich Mastermind
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but doesn't speak

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the demilich makes a saving throw against an effect that deals half damage on a success, it takes no damage on a success and half damage on a failure.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, one of the five tiny warding gems set on its forehead or teeth shatters.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A demilich doesn't require air, sustenance, or sleep.

action.name: Devour Soul
entries: The demilich targets one creature within 120 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a success, or if all the large soul gems on the demilich's skull are occupied, the creature takes 40 necrotic damage, and the demilich regains the same number of hit points. If the target fails its saving throw and there is at least one unoccupied soul gem on the demilich's skull, the demilich regains 40 hit points, and the target dies instantly. Its soul is trapped in a soul gem on the demilich's skull, visible as a tiny, creature-shaped mote of light. While its soul is trapped, a creature can't be restored to life by any means. A soul that remains in a soul gem for 30 days is destroyed forever. If the demilich is defeated and a soul gem crushed, the creature is restored to life if its body is within 100 miles. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw against this effect is immune to it for 24 hours.
A demilich begins combat with four empty soul gems.

reaction.name: Reflection Arcane (While Bloodied)
entries: When the demilich succeeds on a saving throw against a spell targeting it, it forces the spell to also target another creature within 30 feet.

reaction.name: Skull Shock (While Bloodied)
entries: When the demilich takes damage from a melee attack, the attacker takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) lightning damage.

legendary.name: Cranial Transposition
entries: The dust surrounding the demilich falls to the ground. The demilich and a non-magical, unattended skull within 30 feet teleport, switching places. Until the demilich moves or attacks, it is indistinguishable from a non-magical sjull, and the dust composing the demilich's wraithlike body doesn't reform around it.

legendary.name: Dust Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dust of the demilich's body swirls in a 30-foot radius around the demilich. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. The demilich then moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Ringing Laugh (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 60 feet that can hear the demilich makes a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition frightened} of the demilich until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Telekinesis
entries: The demilich targets a Huge or smaller creature or an object weighing up to 1,000 pounds within 60 feet. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw. Otherwise, the demilich moves the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including up. If another creature or object stops the target's movement, both take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage. At the end of this movement, the target falls if it is still in the air, taking falling damage as normal.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The balor has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The balor radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Death Throes
entries: When the balor dies, it explodes. Each creature within 30 feet makes a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 52 ({@damage 15d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of the balor's turn, each creature within 10 feet takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. A creature that touches the balor or hits it with a melee attack takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The balor attacks with its lightning sword and its fire whip.

action.name: Lightning Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Fire Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 45 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage, and the target makes a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is pulled up to 40 feet towards the balor.

action.name: Whip Crack (1/Day)
entries: A 90-foot cone of thunderous flame emanates from the balor. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage and 28 ({@damage 8d6}) thunder damage and falling {@condition prone} on a failed save or taking half damage on a successful one.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The balor magically teleports to a space within 120 feet that it can see.

reaction.name: Instinctive Teleport
entries: After the balor takes damage, it uses Teleport.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The balor has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The balor radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Death Throes
entries: When the balor dies, it explodes. Each creature within 30 feet makes a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 52 ({@damage 15d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of the balor's turn, each creature within 10 feet takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. A creature that touches the balor or hits it with a melee attack takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the balor general fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, it wards itself with its sword. The lightning that wreathes the sword winks out. The lightning reappears at the beginning of the balor's next turn. Until then, the balor's lightning sword deals no lightning damage, and the balor can't use Avenging Bolt.

trait.name: Fast Reflexes
entries: The balor general may take two reactions per round, but not more than one per turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The balor attacks with its lightning sword and its fire whip.

action.name: Lightning Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Fire Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 45 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage, and the target makes a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is pulled up to 40 feet towards the balor.

action.name: Whip Crack (1/Day)
entries: A 90-foot cone of thunderous flame emanates from the balor. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage and 28 ({@damage 8d6}) thunder damage and falling {@condition prone} on a failed save or taking half damage on a successful one.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The balor magically teleports to a space within 120 feet that it can see.

reaction.name: Avenging Sword
entries: When damaged by a melee weapon attack, the balor attacks with its lightning sword.

reaction.name: Hunter's Whip
entries: When damaged by a ranged weapon attack, spell, area effect, or magical effect, the balor uses Teleport and then attacks with its fire whip.

reaction.name: Avenging Bolt (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: When damaged by a ranged weapon attack, spell, or magical effect, a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide lightning bolt springs from the balor's extended sword. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The dretch radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Energy-Sucking Aura
entries: A non-demon creature that takes an action or bonus action while within 10 feet of a dretch can't take another action, bonus action, or reaction until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The glabrezu radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The glabrezu makes two pincer attacks.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple one target. While grappling a target, a pincer can't attack a different target. If the same creature is {@condition grappled} by both of the glabrezu's pincers, it must escape from each of them separately.

action.name: Wish
entries: Once per 30 days, the glabrezu can cast {@spell wish|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for a mortal, using no material components. Before doing so, it will demand that the mortal commit a terribly evil act or make a painful sacrifice.

bonus.name: Fists
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Rend
entries: If grappling the same target with both pincers, the glabrezu rips at the target, ending both grapples and dealing 27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) slashing damage. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, it dies and is torn in half.

bonus.name: Darkness
entries: Magical darkness spreads from a point within 30 feet, filling a 15-foot-radius sphere and spreading around corners. It remains for 1 minute, until the glabrezu dismisses it, or until the glabrezu uses this ability again. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and non-magical light can't illuminate it.

bonus.name: Confusion (1/Day)
entries: The glabrezu targets up to three creatures within 90 feet. Each target makes a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw, becoming {@condition confused|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for 1 minute on a failure. A target repeats this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The hezrou radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hezrou makes one attack with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the hezrou can't bite another target.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The hezrou makes a bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits and the hezrou has not swallowed another creature, the target is swallowed and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature has total cover from attacks from outside the hezrou, it is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, and it takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the hezrou's turns.
If a swallowed creature deals 25 or more damage to the hezrou in a single turn, or if the hezrou dies, the hezrou vomits up the creature.

action.name: Darkness
entries: Magical darkness spreads from a point within 30 feet, filling a 15-foot-radius sphere and spreading around corners. It remains for 1 minute, until the hezrou dismisses it, or until the hezrou uses this ability again. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness and non-magical light can't illuminate it.

reaction.name: Stench (1/Day)
entries: When hit by a melee attack, the hezrou emits a cloud of foul-smelling poison gas in a 20-foot radius. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The demon radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Radiant Weakness
entries: If the demon takes radiant damage while it is bloodied, it is {@condition frightened} of the damage's source for 1 minute.

trait.name: Varied Shapes
entries: Each horde demon has a unique combination of attacks and powers. Roll 1d10 once or twice, rerolling duplicates, or choose one or two features from the following table. A horde demon's features determine the attacks it can make.

rows: Bat Head: The demon emits a 15-foot cone of cacophonous sound. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) thunder damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

Bulging Eyes (Gaze): A creature within 60 feet makes a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage and is {@condition frightened} of the demon until the end of the target's next turn.
Claws: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage.
Fangs: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

Goat Horns: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target makes a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

Lamprey Mouth: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the lamprey mouth attack can be used only on this target and automatically hits.
Porcupine Quills: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.
Scorpion Tail: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

Tentacle Arms: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grappled ends, the tentacle arms attack can only be used on this target.

Whispering Mouth: The demon targets a creature within 30 feet that can hear it. The target makes a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it takes 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) psychic damage and is magically cursed until the start of the demon's next turn. While cursed, the demon's attacks against the target are made with advantage, and the target has disadvantage on saving throws against the demon's Whispering Mouth.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The demon makes two attacks, using any attack granted by its Varied Shapes trait.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The band radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Area Vulnerability
entries: The band takes double damage from any effect that targets an area.

trait.name: Band
entries: The band is composed of 5 or more {@creature horde demons|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}. If it is subjected to a spell, attack, or other effect that affects only one target, it takes any damage but ignores other effects. It can share its space with Medium or smaller creatures or objects. The band can move through any opening large enough for one Medium creature without squeezing.

trait.name: Band Dispersal
entries: When the band is reduced to 0 hit points, it turns into 2 {bestiary horde demons|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} with 26 hit points each.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The band attacks twice.

action.name: Mob Attack
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}50 ({@damage 10d6 + 15}) slashing damage, or half damage if the band is bloodied.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The marilith radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The marilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marilith makes six attacks with its longswords.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}).

bonus.name: Telport
entries: The marilith magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Reactive Teleport
entries: When the marilith is hit or missed by a ranged attack, it uses Teleport. If it teleports within 5 feet of a creature, it can attack with its tail.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The nalfeshnee radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The nalfeshnee has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nalfeshnee makes a bite attack and a claws attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) piercing damage. If it uses its bite on a dead, non-demon creature, it regains 27 hit points and recharges its Horror Nimbus. It may gain this benefit only once per creature.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d12 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Chaos Blast
entries: Beams of multicoloured light arc through a 15-foot-radius sphere centred on a point within 90 feet. Each creature in the area that does not have a Chaotic alignment makes a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw, taking 52 ({@damage 8d12}) force damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

bonus.name: Horror Nimbus (1/Day)
entries: The nalfeshnee glows with an unholy, multicoloured radiance. Each creature within 15 feet of the nalfeshnee that can see it makes a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition frightened} of the nalfeshnee for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Telport
entries: The nalfeshnee magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The quasit radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The quasit has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Claws (Bite While Shapeshifted)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target makes a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, becoming {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failure. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Scare (Quasit Form Only)
entries: A creature within 20 feet that can see the quasit makes a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} of the quasit for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. If a creature makes its saving throw or the condition ends for it, it is immune to any quasit's Scare for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Shapeshift
entries: The quasit magically changes its form into a bat (speed 10 ft., fly 40 ft.), centipede (40 ft., climb 40 ft.), or toad (40 ft., swim 40 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form except for its movement speeds. Equipment it is carrying is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

bonus.name: Invisibility
entries: The quasit magically turns {@condition invisible}, along with any equipment it carries. This invisibility ends if the quasit makes an attack, falls {@condition unconscious}, or dismisses the effect.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The quasit radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The quasit has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Familiar
entries: The quasit can communicate telepathically with its master while they are within 1 mile of each other. When the quasit is within 10 feet of its master, its master shares its Magic Resistance trait.

action.name: Claws (Bite While Shapeshifted)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target makes a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, becoming {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failure. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Scare (Quasit Form Only)
entries: A creature within 20 feet that can see the quasit makes a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} of the quasit for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. If a creature makes its saving throw or the condition ends for it, it is immune to any quasit's Scare for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Shapeshift
entries: The quasit magically changes its form into a bat (speed 10 ft., fly 40 ft.), centipede (40 ft., climb 40 ft.), or toad (40 ft., swim 40 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form except for its movement speeds. Equipment it is carrying is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

bonus.name: Invisibility
entries: The quasit magically turns {@condition invisible}, along with any equipment it carries. This invisibility ends if the quasit makes an attack, falls {@condition unconscious}, or dismisses the effect.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The demon radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Incorporeal
entries: The demon can move through creatures and objects. It takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the demon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Perception checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Darken Light
entries: The demon magically targets a non-magical flame or an area of magical light created by a 2nd-level or lower spell slot within 60 feet. Any area of bright light created by the light source instead casts dim light for 10 minutes.

action.name: Replace Shadow
entries: The demon targets a humanoid within 5 feet that is in dim light and can't see the demon. The target makes a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a success, the target is aware of the demon. On a failure, the target is unaware of the demon, the target no longer casts a natural shadow, and the demon magically takes on the shape of the target's shadow, appearing indistinguishable from a natural shadow except when it attacks. The demon shares the target's space and moves with the target. When the demon is dealt damage while sharing the target's space, it takes half the damage (rounded down) and the other half is dealt to the target. The effect ends when the target drops to 0 hit points, the demon no longer shares the target's space, the demon or target is affected by {@spell dispel evil and good|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or a similar effect, or the demon begins its turn in an area of sunlight.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) cold damage.

bonus.name: Shadow Sneak
entries: The demon takes the Hide action even if obscured only by dim light or darkness.

trait.name: Chaotic Evil
entries: The vrock radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vrock attacks with its beak and its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the vrock has advantage on the attack roll, it deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spores (1/Day)
entries: A 15-foot-radius cloud of spores emanates from the vrock, spreading around corners. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, becoming {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failure. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) ongoing poison damage. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Stunning Screech (1/Day)
entries: The vrock screeches. Each non-demon creature within 20 feet that can hear it makes a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition debilitated|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the end of the vrock's next turn.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Barbed Hide
entries: A creature that grapples or is {@condition grappled} by the devil takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage at the beginning of the devil's turn.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: The devil's darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
entries: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes two attacks with its claws and one with its tail. Alternatively, it uses Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If both claw attacks hit the same Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). While the target is {@condition grappled}, this attack may be used only against the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage against that creature.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it catches on fire, taking 5 ({@damage 1d10}) ongoing fire damage. If the target is an unattended flammable object, it catches on fire. A creature can use an action to extinguish this fire.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: The devil's darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
entries: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil attacks once with its beard and once with its glaive.

action.name: Beard
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition poisoned} until the end of the devil's next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or construct, it makes a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it receives an infernal wound and takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) ongoing slashing damage. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the ongoing damage increases by 5 ({@damage 1d10}). A creature can spend an action to make a {@dc 12} Medicine check, ending the ongoing damage on a success. At least 1 hit point of magical healing also ends the ongoing damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: The devil's darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
entries: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

action.name: Barbed Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage. If the attack is a melee attack against a creature, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the devil can't use its barbed spear on another target.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The devil magically turns invisible, along with any equipment it carries. This invisibility ends if the devil makes an attack, falls {@condition unconscious}, or dismisses the effect.

bonus.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage, and the target makes a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, becoming {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute on a failure. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: The devil's darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
entries: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Rattling Chains
entries: Whenever the devil moves, the rattling of its chains can e heard up to 300 feet away, unless it moves at half its Speed.

trait.name: Relentless Tracker
entries: Once the devil has {@condition grappled} a creature in its chains, it has advantage on ability checks made to track that creature for the next 30 days.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chain devil makes two chain attacks and commands up to two animated chains under its control to make chain attacks.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}) and {@condition restrained}. Until the grapple ends, this chain can only attack the {@condition grappled} target.

bonus.name: Animate Chain
entries: One inanimate, unattended chain within 60 feet sprouts blades and magically animates under the devil's control for 1 hour. It has AC 20 and 20 hit points, a Speed of 0, and immunity to piercing, poison, psychic, and thunder damage. When the devil uses Multiattack, the devil may command the chain to make one chain attack against a target within 15 feet of it. If the chain is reduced to 0 hit points, it can't be reanimated.

reaction.name: Unnerving Mask
entries: When damaged by a creature within 30 feet that can see the devil, the devil momentarily assumes the magical illusory form of one of the attacker's enemies or loved ones, alive or dead. The illusory figure may speak words that only the attacker can hear. The attacker makes a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage and is {@condition frightened} of the devil until the end of its next turn. The attacker is then immune to this effect for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The chained one has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: The chained one's darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
entries: The chained one radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

entries: Whenever the chained one moves, the rattling of its chains can e heard up to 300 feet away, unless it moves at half its Speed.

trait.name: Relentless Tracker
entries: Once the chained one has {@condition grappled} a creature in its chains, it has advantage on ability checks made to track that creature for the next 30 days.

trait.name: Burning Blood (While Bloodied)
entries: When a creature within 5 feet hits the chained one with a melee attack, boiling black blood spurts from the wound. The attacker makes a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chained one makes two chain attacks and commands up to two animated chains under its control to make chain attacks.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}) and {@condition restrained}. Until the grapple ends, this chain can only attack the {@condition grappled} target.

action.name: Despairing Howl (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The chained one screams. Each creature that can hear it within 90 feet makes a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) thunder damage and 28 ({@damage 8d6}) psychic damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

bonus.name: Animate Chain
entries: One inanimate, unattended chain within 60 feet sprouts blades and magically animates under the chained one's control for 1 hour. It has AC 20 and 20 hit points, a Speed of 0, and immunity to piercing, poison, psychic, and thunder damage. When the chained one uses Multiattack, the chained one may command the chain to make one chain attack against a target within 15 feet of it. If the chain is reduced to 0 hit points, it can't be reanimated.

reaction.name: Unnerving Mask
entries: When damaged by a creature within 30 feet that can see the chained one, the chained one momentarily assumes the magical illusory form of one of the attacker's enemies or loved ones, alive or dead. On a failure, it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage and is {@condition frightened} of the chained one until the end of its next turn. The attacker is then immune to this effect for the next 24 hours.

entries: The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
entries: The erinyes radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The erinyes makes three attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage, and the target makes a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours or until the poison is removed by {@spell lesser restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or similar magic.

action.name: Lasso
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}The target is entangled by the lasso. While entangled, it can't move more than 15 feet away from the erinyes. The entanglement ends if the erinyes releases the lasso or becomes {@condition incapacitated}, or if the lasso is destroyed. The lasso is an object with AC 12 and 20 hit points and is immune to piercing, poison, psychic, and thunder damage. The entanglement also ends if the target or a creature within 5 feet of it uses an action to succeed on a {@dc 16} Athletics or Acrobatics check to remove the lasso. The erinyes can't make a lasso attack while a creature is entangled.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: If the erinyes is wielding a longsword and can see its attacker, it adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it.

entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
entries: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: The devil's darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes two attacks with its fork and one with its tail. It can replace any melee attack with Hurl Flame.

action.name: Fork
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or construct, it makes a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it receives an infernal wound and takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) ongoing piercing damage. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the ongoing damage increases by 11 ({@damage 2d10}). A creature can spend an action to make a {@dc 12} Medicine check, ending the ongoing damage on a success. At least 1 hit point of magical healing also ends the ongoing damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If the target is an unattended flammable object or a creature, it catches fire, taking 5 ({@damage 1d10}) ongoing fire damage. A creature can use an action to extinguish this fire.

action.name: Inferno (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: The devil waves its fork, igniting a trail of roaring flame. Any creature within 10 feet of the devil makes a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 14d6}) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Pin (1/Day)
entries: When a creature misses the devil with a melee attack, the devil makes a fork attack against that creature. On a hit, the target is impaled by the fork and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the devil can't make fork attacks or use Inferno, but the target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the beginning of each of its turns.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

entries: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

action.name: Claws

If the target is a creature, it makes a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, becoming {@condition slowed|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for 1 minute on a failure. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Ice Wall (1/Day)
entries: The devil magically creates a wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet. The wall is flat, 1 foot thick, and can be up to 50 feet long and 15 feet high. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until destroyed. Each 10-foot section has AC 12, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.

If the wall enters a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (creature's choice). The creature then makes a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 14d4}) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

bonus.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

reaction.name: Freezing Blood (1/Day)
entries: When a creature within 60 feet that the devil can see hits it with a ranged attack or includes it in a spell's area, the creature makes a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and is {@condition slowed|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the end of its next turn.

Its statistics are the same in each form except for its movement speeds. Equipment it carries is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Band Dispersal
entries: When the band is reduced to 0 hit points, it turns into 2 {@creature lemure|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E|lemures} with 6 hit points each.

trait.name: Band
entries: The band is composed of 5 or more {@creature lemure|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E|lemures}. If it is subjected to a spell, attack, or other effect that affects only one target, it takes any damage but ignores other effects. It can share its space with Medium or smaller creatures or objects. The band can move through any opening large enough for one Medium creature without squeezing.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 5d4}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The pit fiend's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Lawful Evil
entries: The pit fiend radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pit fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: A creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of it makes a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} of the pit fiend until the start of its next turn. On a success, it is immune to this pit fiend's Fear Aura for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pit fiend attacks wtih its bite and mace.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it makes a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) ongoing poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat this saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it makes a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 15 feet away from the pit fiend and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Circle of Fire (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: A 15-foot-tall, 1-foot-thick, 20-foot-diameter ring of fire appears around the pit fiend, with the pit fiend at the centre. The fire is opaque to every creature except the pit fiend. When the ring of fire appears, each creature it intersects makes a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a successful one. A creature takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) fire damage the first time each turn it enters the area or when it ends its turn there. The fire lasts 1 minute or until the pit fiend dismisses it, becomes {@condition incapacitated}, or leaves its area.

bonus.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}). While the target is grappled, the pit fiend can't use its claw against a different creature.

bonus.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite

action.name: Tail

entries: The pteranodon doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of a creature's reach.

action.name: Bite

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The raptor has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the raptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Trample
entries: The triceratops moves up to its speed in a straight line. It can move through the space of Large and smaller creatures. Each of these creatures makes a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage on a failure.

entries: The tyrannosaurus makes a bite attack and a tail attack against two different targets.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the tyrannosaurus can't bite a different creature and it has advantage on bite attacks against the {@condition grappled} creature.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tyrannosaurus makes a bite attack and a tail attack against two different targets.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the tyrannosaurus can't bite a different creature and it has advantage on bite attacks against the {@condition grappled} creature.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Elite Recovery (While Bloodied)
entries: The dire tyrannosaurus rex ends one negative effect currently affecting it. It can use this bonus action as long as it has at least 1 hit point, even while {@condition unconscious} or {@condition incapacitated}.

bonus.name: Tail Sweep (While Bloodied)
entries: The dire tyrannosaurus rex makes a tail attack against each creature within 10 feet. A creature hit by an attack makes a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

bonus.name: Trample (While Bloodied)
entries: The dire tyrannosaurus rex moves up to its speed in a straight line. It can move through the spaces of Large and smaller creatures. Each of these creatures makes a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

bonus.name: Roar (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: Each creature of the dire tyrannosaurus rex's choice within 120 feet that hears its roar makes a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition frightened} of the tyrannosaurus for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Precise Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is surprised, it takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage.

bonus.name: Shapeshift
entries: The doppelganger changes its form to that of any Small or Medium humanoid it has seen before, or back into its true form. While shapeshifted, its statistics are the same. Any equipment is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

bonus.name: Read Thoughts
entries: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet that it can see. Until the end of its turn, it has advantage on attack rolls and on Deception, Insight, Intimidation, and Persuasion checks against the creature.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: When submerged in water, the dragon has advantage on Stealth checks. If the dragon hits a creature that can't see it with its bite, it can deal piercing damage and {@condition grappled||grapple} the target simultaneously.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, it sheds some of its scales, which turn to mud. If it has no more uses of this ability, its Armour Class is reduced to 20 until it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Ruthless (1/Round)
entries: After scoring a critical hit on its turn, the dragon can immediately make one claw attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws. In place of its bite attack, it can use Acid Spit.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage. Instead of dealing piercing damage, the dragon can {@condition grappled||grapple} the target (escape {@dc 23}), and a Huge or smaller creature {@condition grappled} in this way is {@condition restrained}. While grappling a creature, the dragon can't bite or use Acid Spit against another target.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage, and the dragon pushes the target 10 feet away.

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) acid damage on a failure or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save also takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) ongoing acid damage. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon exhales sizzling acid in a 90-foot-long, 10-foot-wide line. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 85 ({@damage 19d8}) acid damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Tail Attack
entries: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

legendary.name: Darkness
entries: The dragon creates a 40-foot-radius sphere of magical darkness originating from a point it can see within 120 feet. Darkvision can't penetrate this darkness. The darkness lasts for 1 minute or until the dragon uses this action again.

legendary.name: Roar
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} of the dragon for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The dragon lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A dragon lich doesn't require air, sustenance, or sleep.

trait.name: Undead Telepathy
entries: The dragon lich can communicate telepathically with undead creatures within 120 feet.

entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

legendary.name: Quake (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses its Quake action.

legendary.name: Elite Recovery (While Bloodied)
entries: The dragon ends one negative effect currently affecting it. It can do so as long as it has at least 1 hit point, even while {@condition unconscious} or {@condition incapacitated}.

legendary.name: Mortal Terror (Gaze, While Bloodied)
entries: A creature within 120 feet makes a saving throw against Roar, even if it has already successfully saved within the past 24 hours.

legendary.name: Storm Surge (Costs 2 Actions, While Bloodied)
entries: The dragon recharges its breath weapon.

legendary.name: Thunderstrike (Costs 3 Actions, While Bloodied)
entries: The dragon strikes a creature within 120 feet with a blast of electricity. The creature is affected as if caught in the dragon's breath weapon, rolling to save as normal.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Desert Farer
entries: The dragon ignores difficult terrain or obscurement caused by sand or gravel, even while flying. Additionally, it ignores the effects of extreme heat.

trait.name: Dune Splitter
entries: The dragon can remain submerged in sand or gravel for up to 4 hours. It has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in this way, and Large or smaller creatures within 20 feet of its hiding place when it emerges must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, it loses its Undead Telepathy trait until the end of its next turn. Until the end of its next turn, undead creatures under its control are {@condition dazed|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it has a soul vessel, a destroyed dragon lich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points. The new body forms within 10 feet of the soul vessel.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The dragon lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A dragon lich doesn't require air, sustenance, or sleep.

trait.name: Undead Telepathy
entries: The dragon lich can communicate telepathically with undead creatures within 120 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws. In place of its bite attack, it can use Arc Lightning.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage, and the dragon pushes the target 10 feet away.

action.name: Arc Lightning
entries: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failure or half damage on a success. Also on a failure, the lightning jumps. Choose a creature within 30 feet of the target that hasn't been hit by this ability on this turn, and repeat the effect against it, possibly causing the lightning to jump again.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon exhales a 120-foot-long, 10-foot-wide line of lightning. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 9d10}) lightning damage and 44 ({@damage 8d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save can't take reactions until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Quake
entries: While touching natural ground, the dragon sends pulses of thunder rippling through it. Creatures within 30 feet make a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage and falling {@condition prone} on a failure. If a Large or smaller creature that fails the save is standing on sand, it also sinks partially, becoming {@condition restrained} as well. A creature {@condition restrained} in this way can spend half its movement to escape.

reaction.name: Tail Attack
entries: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

legendary.name: Roar
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a {@dc 21} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} of the dragon for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

legendary.name: Quake (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses its Quake action.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 90-foot cone. A creature with immunity to poison damage that fails the save takes no damage, but its poison immunity is reduced to resistance for the next hour.

action.name: Honeyed Words
entries: The dragon's words sow doubt in the minds of those who hear them. One creature within 60 feet who can hear and understand the dragon makes a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature must use its reaction, if available, to make one attack against a creature of the dragon's choice with whatever weapon it has to do so, moving up to its speed as part of the reaction if necessary. It need not use any special class features (such as Sneak Attack or Divine Smite) when making this attack. If it can't get in a position to attack the creature, it moves as far as it can toward the target before regaining its senses. A creature immune to being {@condition charmed} is immune to this ability.

entries: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) poison damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Woodland Stalker
entries: When in a forested area, the dragon has advantage on Stealth checks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 22}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, it sheds some of its scales, which turn to charcoal. If it has no more uses of this ability, its Armour Class is reduced to 20 until it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Searing Heat
entries: A creature that touches the dragon or hits it with a melee attack for the first time on a turn takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Volcanic Tyrant
entries: The dragon is immune to the effects of poisonous gases caused by volcanic environments. It also ignores difficult terrain caused by lava.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws. In place of its bite attack, it can Spit Fire.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage, and the dragon pushes the target 10 feet away.

action.name: Cruel Tyranny
entries: The dragon snarls and threatens its minions, driving them to immediate action. The dragon chooses one creature it can see that can hear the dragon. The creature uses its reaction to make one weapon attack with advantage. If the dragon is bloodied, it can use this ability on three minions at once.

action.name: Spit Fire
entries: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save also takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) ongoing fire damage. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon exhales a blast of fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 98 ({@damage 28d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the saving throw also takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) ongoing fire damage. While affected by this ongoing damage, it is {@condition frightened} of the dragon. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

reaction.name: Tail Attack
entries: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

reaction.name: Taskmaster
entries: When a creature within 60 feet fails an ability check or saving throw, the dragon roars a command to it. The creature can roll a {@dice d10} and add it to the result of the roll, possibly turning the failure into a success.

legendary.name: Cruel Tyranny
entries: The dragon uses its Cruel Tyranny action.

legendary.name: Roar
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a {@dc 22} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} of the dragon for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

entries: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) cold damage, and its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn. On a success, it takes half damage.

action.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon exhales a 90-foot cone of frost. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage and 31 ({@damage 9d6}) necrotic damage, and its speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn. On a success, it takes half damage.

reaction.name: Tail Attack
entries: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

legendary.name: Roar
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} of the dragon for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

legendary.name: Raging Storm (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: For 1 minute, gusts of sleet emanate from the dragon in a 40-foot-radius sphere, spreading around corners. The area is lightly obscured, the ground is difficult terrain, and nonmagical flames are extinguished. The first time a creature other than the dragon moves on its turn while in the area, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) cold damage and fall {@condition prone} (or fall if it is flying).

entries: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, it sheds some of its scales, which turn to ice. If it has no more uses of this ability, its Armour Class is reduced to 16 until it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Cold Mastery
entries: The dragon's movement and vision is not hindered by cold, icy surfaces, snow, wind, or storms. Additionally, the dragon can choose to burrow through snow and ice without leaving a trace.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The dragon can burrow through non-magical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the dragon remains motionless within its linked area, it is indistinguishable from a natural rocky outcropping.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, it becomes more like rock. Its Speed, burrow speed, and flying speed are halved until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its slam. In place of its bite attack, it can use Rock Spire.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 5d10 + 8}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing piercing damage, the dragon can {@condition grappled||grapple} the target (escape {@dc 23}), and a Huge or smaller creature {@condition grappled} this way is {@condition restrained}. While grappling a creature, the dragon can't bite another target.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed up to 10 feet away, falling {@condition prone} if it impacts a wall or other solid object. This attack deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage if the target was already prone.

action.name: Scouring Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon exhales scouring sand and stones in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 ({@damage 20d6}) slashing damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save is also {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Rock Spire
entries: A permanent, 25-foot-tall, 5-foot-radius spire of rock magically rises from a point on the ground within 60 feet. A creature in the spire's area when it appears makes a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) piercing damage on a failure or half damage on a success. A creature that fails this saving throw by 10 or more is impaled and {@condition restrained} at the top of the spire. A creature can use an action to make a {@dc 13} Strength check, freeing the impaled creature on a success. The impaled creature is also freed if the spire is destroyed. The spire is an object with AC 16, 30 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

legendary.name: Shake the Foundation
entries: The dragon causes the ground to roil, creating a permanent, 40-foot-radius area of difficult terrain centered on a point the dragon can see. If the dragon is bloodied, creatures in the area make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) slashing damage and falls {@condition prone}. On a success, the creature takes half damage.

legendary.name: Slam Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon makes a slam attack.

legendary.name: Entomb (While Bloodied, Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon targets a creature on the ground within 60 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the creature is magically entombed 5 feet under the earth. While entombed, the target is {@condition blinded}, {@condition restrained}, and can't breathe. A creature can use an action to make a {@dc 17} Strength check, freeing an entombed creature on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Flowing Grace
entries: The dragon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies or swims out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, it loses coordination as white-crested waves run up and down its body. It loses its Flowing Grace and Shimmering Scales traits until the beginning of its next turn.

trait.name: Shimmering Scales
entries: While in water, the dragon gains three-quarters cover from attacks made by creatures more than 30 feet away.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) piercing damage.

A creature that fails the save is also knocked {@condition prone} and is pushed up to 60 feet away. A creature that impacts a solid object takes an extra 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage.

entries: When a creature the dragon can see hits it with a melee weapon attack, the dragon makes a bite attack against the attacker.

legendary.name: Lurk
entries: The dragon takes the Hide action.

entries: The dragon exhales a shadowy maelstrom of anguish in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw, taking 67 ({@damage 15d8}) necrotic damage and gaining a level of {@condition strife|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} on a failed save or half damage on a success.

legendary.name: Corrupting Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice within 120 feet and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or gain a level of {@condition strife|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}. Once a creature has passed or failed this saving throw, it is immune to the dragon's Corrupting Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Lurk
entries: If the dragon is in dim light or darkness, it magically becomes {@condition invisible} until it attacks, causes a creature to make a saving throw, or enters an area of bright light. It can't use this ability if it has taken radiant damage since the end of its last turn.

legendary.name: Slip Through Shadows
entries: If the dragon is in dim light or darkness, it magically teleports up to 45 feet to an unoccupied space that is also in dim light or darkness. The dragon can't use this ability if it has taken radiant damage since the end of its last turn.

legendary.name: Horrid Whispers (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: A creature that can hear the dragon makes a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage, and the dragon regains the same number of hit points.

reaction.name: Assume Control (While Bloodied)
entries: When a creature {@condition charmed} by the dragon begins its turn, the dragon telepathically commands the {@condition charmed} creature until the end of the creature's turn. If the dragon commands the creature to take an action that would harm itself or an ally, the creature makes a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the creature's turn immediately ends.

legendary.name: Charm
entries: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the dragon for 24 hours, regarding it as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although it isn't under the dragon's control, it takes the dragon's requests or actions in the most favourable way it can. At the end of each of the target's turns and at the end of any turn during which the dragon or its companions harmed the target, it repeats the saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

legendary.name: Stupefy
entries: The dragon targets a creature within 60 feet. If the target is concentrating on a spell, it must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or lose concentration.

legendary.name: Psionic Wave (Costs 2 Actions)

entries: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, its eyes dull as it briefly loses its connection to the future. Until the end of its next turn, it can't use Foretell, Prognosticate, or Prophesy Doom, and it loses its Predictive Harmonics trait.

trait.name: Predictive Harmonics
entries: The dragon is psionically aware of its own immediate future. The dragon cannot be surprised, and any time the dragon would make a roll with disadvantage, it makes that roll normally instead.
