action.name: Discognitive Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon unleashes psychic energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 21} Intelligence saving throw, taking 66 ({@damage 12d10}) psychic damage and 22 ({@damage 4d10}) ongoing psychic damage on a failed save or half damage and no ongoing psychic damage on a success. The ongoing damage ends if a creature falls {@condition unconscious}. A creature can use an action to ground itself in reality, ending the ongoing damage.

action.name: Prognosticate (3/Day)
entries: The dragon psionically makes a prediction of an event up to 300 years in the future. This prediction has a 75% chance to being perfectly accurate and a 25% chance of being partially or wholly wrong. Alternatively, the dragon can choose to gain truesight to a range of 120 feet for 1 minute.

reaction.name: Prophesy Doom (While Bloodied)
entries: When a language-using creature suffering ongoing psychic damage targets the dragon with an attack or spell, the dragon telepathically prophesies the attacker's doom. The attacker makes a {@dc 20} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the target magically gains the {@condition doomed|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} condition. It is aware that it will die due to some bizarre circumstance within 13 ({@dice 2d12}) hours. In addition to the normal means of removing the condition, this doom can be avoided by a spell that can predict the future, such as {@spell augury|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}, {@spell contact other plane|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}, or {@spell foresight|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}. The dragon can end the effect as an action.

legendary.name: Foretell
entries: The dragon psionically catches a glimpse of a fast-approaching moment and plans accordingly. The dragon rolls a {@dice d20} and records the number rolled. Until the end of the dragon's next turn, the dragon can replace the result of any d20 rolled by it or a creature within 120 feet with the foretold number. Each foretold roll can be used only once.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)

items.name: Molten Breath
entries: The dragon exhales molten glass in a 90-foot-long, 10-foot-wide line. items.name: Sleep Breath
entries: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature falls {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes or until it takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The dragon magically takes the shape of a humanoid or beast or changes back into its true from. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (dragon's choice). In the new form, the dragon's stats are unchanged except for its size. It can't use Molten Spit, Breath Weapons, Tail Attack, or Wing Attack except in dragon form. In beast form, it can attack only with its bite and claws, if appropriate to its form. If the beast form is Large or smaller, the reach of these attacks is reduced to 5 feet. In humanoid form, it can attack only with its staff.

reaction.name: Tail Attack
entries: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

legendary.name: Analyse
entries: The dragon evaluates one creature it can see within 60 feet. It learns the creature's resistances, immunities, vulnerabilities, and current and maximum hit points. That creature's next attack roll against the dragon before the start of the dragon's next turn is made with disadvantage.

legendary.name: Roar
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} of the dragon for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} of the dragon for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. When it succeeds on a saving throw or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Roar for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet makes a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its fly speed.

legendary.name: Trickster's Gambit (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet and creates two illusory duplicates in different unoccupied spaces within 30 feet. These duplicates have an AC of 11, and a creature that hits one with an attack can make a {@dc 19} Investigation check, identifying it as a fake on a success. The duplicates disappear at the end of the dragon's next turn but otherwise mimic the dragon's actions perfectly, even moving according to the dragon's will. The duplicates cannot deal damage.

action.name: Claws

items.name: Slowing Breath
entries: The dragon exhales toxic gas in a 30-foot cone. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

headerEntries: The dragon's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 25}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does, some of its scales fall away, forming pools of molten gold. If it has no more uses of this ability, its Armour Class is reduced to 20 until it finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Valour
entries: Creatures of the dragon's choice within 30 feet gain a +3 bonus to saving throws and are immune to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Claws

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) bludgeoning damage, and the dragon pushes the target 10 feet away.

action.name: Greatsword (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Molten Spit
entries: The dragon targets one creature within 60 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) fire damage on a failure or half on a success. Liquid gold pools in a 5-foot-square occupied by the creature and remains hot for 1 minute. A creature that ends its turn in the gold or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

items.name: Molten Breath
entries: The dragon exhales molten gold in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 ({@damage 16d10}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save is covered in a shell of rapidly cooling gold, reducing its Speed to 0. A creature can use an action to break the shell, ending the effect.

items.name: Weakening Breath
entries: The dragon exhales weaknening gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw or suffer disadvantage on weapon attack rolls for 1 minute. A weakened creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The dragon magically takes the shape of a humanoid or beast or changes back into its true from. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (dragon's choice). In the new form, the dragon's stats are unchanged except for its size. It can't use Molten Spit, Breath Weapons, Tail Attack, or Wing Attack except in dragon form. In beast form, it can attack only with its bite and claws, if appropriate to its form. If the beast form is Large or smaller, the reach of these attacks is reduced to 5 feet. In humanoid form, it can attack only with its greatsword.

entries: When a creature the dragon can see within 10 feet hits the dragon with a melee attack, the dragon makes a tail attack against it.

reaction.name: Vanguard
entries: When another creature the dragon can see within 20 feet is hit by an attack, the dragon deflects the attack, turning the hit into a miss.

legendary.name: Roar
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice within 120 feet that can hear it makes a {@dc 25} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition frightened} of the dragon for 1 minute. A creature in this area attempting to move closer to the dragon must spend 2 feet of movement for every 1 foot closer it moves, and ranged attacks against the dragon are made with disadvantage. A creature that starts its turn in the windstorm makes a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage on a failure. The windstorm lasts until the start of the dragon's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Cloud Strider
entries: The dragon suffers no harmful effects from high altitudes.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

items.name: Frost Breath
entries: The dragon exhales freezing wind in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 40 ({@damage 9d8}) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

items.name: Paralysing Breath
entries: The dragon exhales paralytic gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition staggered|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Cloud Strider
entries: The dragon suffers no harmful effects from high altitudes.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

items.name: Frost Breath
entries: The dragon exhales freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

items.name: Paralysing Breath
entries: The dragon exhales paralytic gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition staggered|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the end of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon turtle's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}52 ({@damage 7d12 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}). Until this grapple ends, the dragon turtle can't bite a different creature, and it has advantage on bite attacks against the grappled creature.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}46 ({@damage 6d12 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals double damage against objects, vehicles, and constructs.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}46 ({@damage 6d12 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it makes a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 15 feet away from the dragon turtle and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon turtle exhales steam in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 52 ({@damage 15d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Lightning Storm (1/Day)
entries: Hundreds of arcs of lightning crackle from the dragon turtle. Each creature within 90 feet makes a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) lightning damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

bonus.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Retract
entries: When the dragon turtle takes 50 damage or more from a single attack or spell, it retracts its head and limbs into its shell. It immediately regains 20 hit points. While retracted; its Speed is 0; it can't take reactions; it has advantage on saving throws; attacks against it have disadvantage; and it has resistance to all damage. The dragon turtle stays retracted until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Tail
entries: When the dragon turtle is hit by an opportunity attack, it makes a tail attack.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon turtle's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the dragon turtle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, the faint glow cast by its shell winks out. When the dragon turtle uses Retract, it gains one more use of this ability and its shell regains its luminescence.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}52 ({@damage 7d12 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}). legendary.name: Claw Kick
entries: The dragon turtle makes a claws attack and then moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Emerald Radiance (1/Day)
entries: Searing green light emanates from the dragon turtle. Each creature within 90 feet makes a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 ({@damage 20d6}) radiant damage on a failure or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the saving throw is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: The dragon turtle recharges and uses Lightning Storm.

legendary.name: Tail (Costs 2 Actions)

monster.name: Dread Knight
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A dread knight doesn't require air, sustenance, or sleep.

trait.name: Unholy Aura
entries: The dread knight and allies within 30 feet have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects and against features that turn undead. Other creatures of the dread knight's choice within 30 feet have disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dread knight attacks twice with its cursed greatsword.

action.name: Cursed Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage, and the target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

action.name: Fire Blast (1/Day)
entries: A fiery mote streaks from the dread knight's finger to a point within 120 feet and blossoms into a 20-foot-radius sphere of black fire that spreads around corners. Each creature within the area makes a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 18d6}) fire damage on a failed saving throw or half damage on a success. This damage ignores fire resistance and treats immunity to fire damage as fire resistance.

action.name: Ice Wall (1/Day)
entries: The dread knight magically creates a wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet. The wall is flat, 1 foot thick, and can be up to 50 feet long and 15 feet high. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until destroyed. Each 10-foot section has AC 12, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.

If the wall enters a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (creature's choice). The creature then makes a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 14d6}) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

action.name: Soul Wrack (1/Day)
entries: The dread knight targets a creature within 60 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. The creature takes 70 ({@damage 20d6}) necrotic damage and falls {@condition prone} on a failure and takes half damage on a success.

action.name: Summon Fiendish Steed (1/Day)
entries: A fell nightmare or wyvern magically appears in an empty space within 5 feet. The steed follows the dread knight's commands and acts on its turn. It may attack on the turn on which it is summoned. It remains until the dread knight dismisses it as an action or it is killed.

bonus.name: Break Magic
entries: The dread knight ends all spell effects created by a 5th-level or lower spell slot on a creature, object, or point it can see within 30 feet.

bonus.name: Cursed Greatsword
entries: The dread knight makes a cursed greatsword attack.

monster.name: Dread Knight Champion
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A dread knight doesn't require air, sustenance, or sleep.

trait.name: Unholy Aura
entries: The dread knight and allies within 30 feet have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects and against features that turn undead. Other creatures of the dread knight's choice within 30 feet have disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

trait.name: Legion
entries: The dread knight's sword is a +3 greatsword that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls when it attacks with its cursed greatsword. A humanoid killed by damage from this sword rises the next dusk as a zombie. While attuned to the sword, the dread knight can use a bonus action to command zombies created in this way.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dread knight attacks twice with its cursed greatsword.

action.name: Cursed Greatsword

action.name: Soul Wrack (1/Day)
entries: The dread knight targets a creature within 60 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. The creature takes 70 ({@damage 20d6}) necrotic damage and falls {@condition prone} on a failure and takes half damage on a success.

action.name: Summon Fiendish Steed (1/Day)
entries: A fell nightmare or wyvern magically appears in an empty space within 5 feet. The steed follows the dread knight's commands and acts on its turn. It may attack on the turn on which it is summoned. It remains until the dread knight dismisses it as an action or it is killed.

bonus.name: Break Magic
entries: The dread knight ends all spell effects created by a 5th-level or lower spell slot on a creature, object, or point it can see within 30 feet.

bonus.name: Cursed Greatsword
entries: The dread knight makes a cursed greatsword attack.

reaction.name: Cold Sacrifice (1/Day)
entries: When the dread knight would fail a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. It then magically teleports to an unoccupied space within 30 feet, leaving behind an inanimate duplicate of itself made of snow.

reaction.name: Deflect
entries: When an attacker the dread knight can see would hit it with a ranged weapon attack or ranged spell attack, it adds 5 to its AC against the attack. If the attack misses, the dread knight can force the attacker to reroll the attack, targeting a creature of its choice within 30 feet.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When an attacker the dread knight can see would hit it with a melee attack, it adds 5 to its AC against the attack. If the attack misses, the dread knight can make a cursed greatsword attack against the attacker.

reaction.name: Seal of Silence
entries: When the dread knight succeeds on a saving throw against a spell cast by a creature it can see, the caster of the spell makes a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the caster is magically unable to speak or cast spells with a vocal component until the end of the caster's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The drider can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Perception checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The drider ignores movement restrictions imposed by webs.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drider makes a claws attack and then either a bite or longsword attack. Alternatively, it makes two longbow attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). While grappling a target, the drider can't attack a different target with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Longsword (wielded two-handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with Nature
entries: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once per turn, the dryad can use 10 feet of movement to enter a living tree and emerge from another living tree within 60 feet. Both trees must be at least Large.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Entangling Plants
entries: Plants magically erupt from the ground in a 20-foot radius around a point up to 120 feet from the dryad. Each creature of the dryad's choice in the area makes a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 12} Strength check, freeing itself or a creature within 5 feet on a success. Additionally, the area is difficult terrain for 1 minute.

action.name: Fey Charm (3/Day)
entries: The dryad targets a humanoid or beast within 30 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is magically {@condition charmed}. While charmed in this way, the target regards the dryad as a trusted ally and is disposed to interpret the dryad's requests and actions favourably. The creature can repeat this saving throw if the dryad or the dryad's allies harm it, ending the effect on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours. If the creature succeeds on a saving throw against Fey Charm or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Fey Charm for 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The naiad has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with Nature
entries: The naiad can communicate with beasts and plants.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once per turn, the naiad can use 10 feet of movement to enter a living tree and emerge from another living tree within 60 feet. Both trees must be at least Large.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The naiad can breathe air and water.

action.name: Watery Grasp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). While grappling a creature this way, the naiad can't use Watery Grasp on a different target and can swim at full speed.

action.name: Entangling Plants
entries: Plants magically erupt from the ground in a 20-foot radius around a point up to 120 feet from the naiad. Each creature of the naiad's choice in the area makes a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 12} Strength check, freeing itself or a creature within 5 feet on a success. Additionally, the area is difficult terrain for 1 minute.

action.name: Fey Charm (3/Day)
entries: The naiad targets a humanoid or beast within 30 feet, forcing it to make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is magically {@condition charmed}. While charmed in this way, the target regards the naiad as a trusted ally and is disposed to interpret the naiad's requests and actions favourably. The creature can repeat this saving throw if the naiad or the naiad's allies harm it, ending the effect on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours. If the creature succeeds on a saving throw against Fey Charm or the effect ends for it, it is immune to Fey Charm for 24 hours.

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The elemental can enter and end its turn in other creatures' spaces and pass through an opening as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Whirlwind (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The elemental takes the form of a whirlwind, flies up to half of its fly speed without provoking opportunity attacks, and then resumes its normal form. When a creature shares its space with the whirlwind for the first time during this movement, that creature makes a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the creature is carried inside the elemental's space until the whirlwind ends, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for each 10 feet it is carried, and falls {@condition prone} at the end of the movement. The whirlwind can carry one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures.

It can grapple one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures.

trait.name: Conductive
entries: If the elemental takes lightning damage, each creature sharing its space takes the same amount of lightning damage.

trait.name: Fluid Form
entries: The elemental can enter and end its turn in other creatures' spaces and move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Freeze
entries: If the elemental takes cold damage, its speed is reduced by 15 feet until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Whelm
entries: The elemental targets each Large or smaller creature in its space. Each target makes a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe air. The elemental can move at full speed while carrying grappled creatures inside its space. It can grapple one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures.

trait.name: Speak with Spiders
entries: The ettercap can communicate with spiders that can hear it or that are touching the same web.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The ettercap can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While touching a web, the ettercap knows the location of other creatures touching that web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions imposed by webs.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ettercap attacks with its bite and claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Strangle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature against which the ettercape has advantage on the attack roll. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the ettercap automatically hits the target with its strangle attack, and the target can't breathe.

bonus.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The creature is {@condition restrained} by webs. As an action, a creature can make a {@dc 11} Strength check, breaking the webs on a success. The effect also ends if the webs are destroyed. They have AC 10, 1 hit point, and immunity to all damage except slashing, fire, and force.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: The ettin can take two reactions each round, but not more than one per turn.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: While both heads are awake, the ettin has advantage on Perception checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition debilitated|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}, and it can't be flanked. Additionally, it gains a +5 bonus to its passive Perception.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, the other is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ettin makes a battleaxe attack and a club attack.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature and the ettin is bloodied, the target makes a {@dc 15} Strength check and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failure.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Axe Whirl (1/Day)
entries: The ettin makes a battleaxe attack against each creature within 10 feet.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The noble's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The noble has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Faerie Form
entries: The noble can magically change its size between Large, Medium, and Tiny as an action. While Tiny, the bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by the noble's attacks is halved. Additionally, it has disadvantage on Strength checks and advantage on Dexterity checks. While Large, the noble has advantage on Strength checks. Its statistics are otherwise unchanged.

trait.name: Faerie Light
entries: As a bonus action, the noble can cast dim light for 30 feet, or extinguish its glow.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The noble makes two attacks.

action.name: Glittering Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold, fire, lightning, or psychic damage (its choice).

action.name: Gleaming Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. This attack ignores half or three-quarters cover. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold, fire, lightning, or psychic damage (its choice).

action.name: Evil Eye (Gaze)
entries: The noble targets one creature not under the effect of a faerie's Evil Eye within 60 feet. The target makes a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the noble chooses one of the following effects to magically impose on the target. Each effect lasts for 1 minute.

items: The target falls asleep. This affect ends if the target takes damage or another creature uses an action to rouse it.
The target is {@condition frightened}. This effect ends if the target is ever 60 feet or more from the noble.
The target is {@condition poisoned}. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Faerie Step (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The noble magically teleports up to 60 feet to a space it can see.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When the noble is hit by a melee attack made by a creature it can see, it makes a glittering scimitar attack against the attacker.

reaction.name: Vengeful Eye
entries: When the noble is hit by a ranged attack or targeted with a spell by a creature within 60 feet, it uses Evil Eye on the attacker if they can see each other.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The archfey's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1e: {@spell weird|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (psychic damage is taken regardless of save result)

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archfey has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Faerie Form
entries: The archfey can magically change its size between Large, Medium, and Tiny as an action. While Tiny, the bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by the archfey's attacks is halved. Additionally, it has disadvantage on Strength checks and advantage on Dexterity checks. While Large, the archfey has advantage on Strength checks. Its statistics are otherwise unchanged.

trait.name: Faerie Light
entries: As a bonus action, the archfey can cast dim light for 30 feet, or extinguish its glow.

trait.name: Elite Recovery
entries: At the end of each of its turns, the archfey can end one condition or effect on itself. It can do so as long as it has at least 1 hit point, even when {@condition unconscious} or {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Fey Madness (While Bloodied)
entries: The archfey can take a reaction on each creature's turn and recharges Faerie Step on each of its own turns.

trait.name: Mass Darkvision
entries: The archfey and creatures it chooses within 120 feet have darkvision out to a range of 120 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archfey makes two attacks.

action.name: Glittering Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold, fire, lightning, or psychic damage (its choice).

action.name: Gleaming Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. This attack ignores half or three-quarters cover. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold, fire, lightning, or psychic damage (its choice).

action.name: Evil Eye (Gaze)
entries: The archfey targets one creature not under the effect of a faerie's Evil Eye within 60 feet. The target makes a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the archfey chooses one of the following effects to magically impose on the target. Each effect lasts for 1 minute.

items: The target falls asleep. This affect ends if the target takes damage or another creature uses an action to rouse it.
The target is {@condition frightened}. This effect ends if the target is ever 60 feet or more from the archfey.
The target is {@condition poisoned}. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Summon Midnight (1/Day)
entries: Night magically falls over a 5-mile-diameter area, lasting for 1 hour. As an action, the archfey can end this effect.

bonus.name: Faerie Step (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The archfey magically teleports up to 60 feet to a space it can see.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When the archfey is hit by a melee attack made by a creature it can see, it makes a glittering scimitar attack against the attacker.

reaction.name: Vengeful Eye
entries: When the archfey is hit by a ranged attack or targeted with a spell by a creature within 60 feet, it uses Evil Eye on the attacker if they can see each other.

trait.name: Faerie Form
entries: The knight can magically change its size between Medium and Tiny as an action. While Tiny, the bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by the knight's attacks is halved. Additionally, it has disadvantage on Strength checks and advantage on Dexterity checks. Its statistics are otherwise unchanged.

trait.name: Faerie Light
entries: As a bonus action, the knight can cast dim light for 30 feet, or extinguish its glow.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two glittering scimitar attacks.

action.name: Glittering Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold, fire, or lightning damage (its choice).

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even if it regains hit points, and it is asleep while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Fey Glamour
entries: The knight targets one humanoid within 30 feet. The target makes a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is magically {@condition charmed} by the knight for 1 day. If the knight or one of the knight's allies harms the target, the target repeats the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to this knight's Fey Flamour for a year and a day.

reaction.name: Nature's Shield
entries: When the knight would be hit by an attack while the knight is within 5 feet of a tree or other large plant, the knight's AC magically increases by 3 against that attack as the plant interposes branches or vines between the knight and the attacker.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pixie has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Faerie Light
entries: As a bonus action, the pixie can cast dim light for 30 feet, or extinguish its glow.

action.name: Thorn Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 10/30 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

action.name: Faerie Blessing (3/Day)
entries: The pixie targets a willing creature within 30 feet. The target gains one of the following abilities for 1 hour:

items: The target gains truesight out to a range of 120 feet.
The target gains the benefit of the pixie's Magic Resistance trait.

action.name: Faerie Curse
entries: The pixie targets a creature within 30 feet not already under a Faerie Curse. The target makes a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is subjected to a special magical curse for 1 hour. The curse ends if the pixie dies or is {@condition incapacitated}, the pixie or one of its allies deals damage to the target, or the pixie spends an action to end the curse. Spells such as {@spell remove curse|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}, {@spell dispel magic|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}, and {@spell lesser restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} also end the curse. If a creature makes its saving throw or the condition ends for it, it is immune to any Faerie Curse for the next 24 hours.
When the target fails its saving throw against this effect, the pixie chooses one of the following effects to impose on the target.

items: The target is {@condition charmed} by the pixie.
If the target is already {@condition charmed} by the pixie, the target falls asleep. It wakes if it is shaken awake as an action or if it takes damage.
The target's head takes on the appearance of a beast's head (donkey, wolf, etc.). The target's statistics don't change, but the target can no longer speak; it can only make animal noises.

bonus.name: Invisibility
entries: The pixie and any equipment it wears or carries magically turns {@condition invisible} until the pixie attacks, casts a spell, becomes {@condition incapacitated}, or uses a bonus action to become visible.

trait.name: Faerie Light
entries: As a bonus action, the sprite can cast dim light for 30 feet, or extinguish its glow.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even if it regains hit points, and it is asleep while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even if it regains hit points, and it is asleep while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Gust
entries: A 30-foot cone of strong wind issues from the sprite. Creatures in the area that fail a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw, and unsecured objects weighing 300 pounds or less, are pushed 10 feet away from the sprite. Unprotected flames in the area are extinguished and gas or vapor is dispersed. Using Gust does not cause the sprite to become visible.

action.name: Heart Sight
entries: The sprite touches a creature. The creature makes a {@dc 10} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, the sprite magically reads its mental state and surface thoughts and learns its alignment (if any). Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

bonus.name: Invisibility
entries: The sprite and any equipment it wears or carries magically turns {@condition invisible} until the sprite attacks, casts a spell, becomes {@condition incapacitated}, or uses a bonus action to become visible.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

action.name: Euphoria Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon breathes an intoxicating gas at a creature within 5 feet. The target makes a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition confused|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Prismatic Light (3/Day)
entries: The dragon's scales pulse with light. Each creature within 15 feet that can see the dragon makes a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature is magically {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Beast Form (1/Day, 50+ Years Old Only)
entries: The dragon targets one creature within 15 feet. The target makes a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is magically transformed into a harmless Tiny beast, such as a mouse or a songbird, for 1 minute. While in this form, its statistics are unchanged, except it can't speak or take actions, reactions, or bonus actions. It gains movements modes appropriate to its form, such as a climb or fly speed, of up to 30 feet. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The effect also ends if the target takes damage.

bonus.name: Invisiblity
entries: The dragon and any equipment it wears or carries magically turns invisible. This invisibility ends if the dragon falls {@condition unconscious}, dismisses the effect, or uses Bite, Euphoria Breath, Prismatic Light, or Beast Form.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dragon's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Familiar
entries: The dragon can communicate telepathically with its master while they are within 1 mile of each other. While the dragon is within 10 feet of its master, its master shares its Magic Resistance trait.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

action.name: Euphoria Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dragon breathes an intoxicating gas at a creature within 5 feet. The target makes a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition confused|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Prismatic Light (3/Day)
entries: The dragon's scales pulse with light. Each creature within 15 feet that can see the dragon makes a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature is magically {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

bonus.name: Invisiblity
entries: The dragon and any equipment it wears or carries magically turns invisible. This invisibility ends if the dragon falls {@condition unconscious}, dismisses the effect, or uses Bite, Euphoria Breath, Prismatic Light, or Beast Form.

monster.name: Flumph
languages: understands common and undercommon but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The flumph can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Flumph Light
entries: As a bonus action, the flumph can cast dim light for 30 feet, or extinguish its glow. The flumph can change the color of the light it casts at will.

trait.name: Telepathic Spy
entries: The flumph can perceive any telepathic messages sent or received within 60 feet, and can't be surprised by creatures with telepathy. The flumph is also immune to divination and to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, except for the Telepathic Spy feature of another flumph.

trait.name: Tippable
entries: If a flumph is knocked {@condition prone}, it lands upside down and is {@condition dazed}. It cannot stand upright while {@condition dazed} in this way. At the end of each of its turns, it can make a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw, flipping itself over and ending the {@condition dazed} and {@condition prone} conditions on a success.

action.name: Tendrils
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Stench Spray (1/Day)
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot cone makes a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the creature exudes a horrible stench for 1 hour. While a creature exudes this stench, it and any creature within 5 feet of it are {@condition poisoned}. A creature can remove the stench on itself by bathing during a rest.

monster.name: Flumph Familiar
languages: understands common and undercommon but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The flumph can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Flumph Light
entries: As a bonus action, the flumph can cast dim light for 30 feet, or extinguish its glow. The flumph can change the color of the light it casts at will.

The flumph is also immune to divination and to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, except for the Telepathic Spy feature of another flumph.

At the end of each of its turns, it can make a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw, flipping itself over and ending the {@condition dazed} and {@condition prone} conditions on a success.

trait.name: Familiar
entries: The flumph can communicate telepathically with its master while they are within 1 mile of each other. While the flumph is within 10 feet of its master, its master gains telepathy out to a range of 60 feet.

action.name: Tendrils
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Stench Spray (1/Day)
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot cone makes a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the creature exudes a horrible stench for 1 hour. While a creature exudes this stench, it and any creature within 5 feet of it are {@condition poisoned}. A creature can remove the stench on itself by bathing during a rest.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The god's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell spirit guardians|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (the god can choose creatures they can see to be unaffected)

trait.name: Aligned
entries: The forgotten god radiates a weak alignment aura, most often Lawful and Good, Chaotic and Good, Lawful and Evil, or Chaotic and Evil. Its behaviour may not match its alignment.

trait.name: Flawed Spellcasting
entries: Whenever the god tries tocast a spell, roll {@dice 1d6}. On a 1, 2, or 3 on the die, the spell visibly fails and has no effect. The god's action for the turn is not wasted, but it can't be used to cast a spell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the god fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, it seems to flicker and shrink, and if using up its essence.

action.name: Divine Weapon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) damage (damage type based on the form of the weapon or implement) plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Debilitating Gaze (Gaze)
entries: The god targets a creature within 60 feet. The target makes a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage and is {@condition debilitated} until the end of its next turn. On a success, the target is immune to Debilitating Gaze for 24 hours.

action.name: Divine Wrath (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: Each creature of the god's choice within 60 feet makes a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) radiant damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

legendary.name: Float
entries: The god flies up to half its fly speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Smite
entries: The god makes a divine weapon attack.

legendary.name: Debilitating Glance
entries: The god uses Debilitating Gaze.

trait.name: Ethereal and Material
entries: The dead man's fingers lives simultaneously on the Ethereal and Material Planes. Its senses extend into both planes, and it can touch and be touched by creatures on both planes.

trait.name: Ethereal Shift
entries: When a creature on the Material Plane touches the dead man's fingers or hits it with a melee attack, the creature is magically transported to the Ethereal Plane. The creature can see and hear into both the Ethereal and Material Plane but is unaffected by creatures and objects on the Material Plane. It can be seen as a ghostly form by creatures on th Material Plane. It can move in any direction, with each foot of movement up or down costing 2 feet of movement.

If the creature is still on the Ethereal Plane when the dead man's fingers dies, the creature returns to the Material Plane. If this would cause a creature to appear in a space occupied by a solid object or creature, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage.

trait.name: Flammable
entries: After taking fire damage, the dead man's fingers catches fire and takes ongoing 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage if it isn't already suffering ongoing fire damage. It can use an action or bonus action to extinguish the fire.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dead man's fingers makes two tendril attacks.

action.name: Tendril (Ethereal or Material Plane)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage. A target on the Material Plane is subject to the Ethereal Shift trait.

action.name: Ethereal Spores (While Bloodied, Ethereal Plane Only)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet makes a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 9d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies. If a creature killed by this attack remains on the Ethereal Plane for 24 hours, its corpse disintegrates, and a new dead man's fingers sprouts from its place.

bonus.name: Telekinetic Pull (Ethereal or Material Plane)
entries: One creature within 90 feet makes a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is magically pulled up to 60 feet straight towards the dead man's fingers.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the shrieker is indistinguishable from a normal fungus.

action.name: Shriek
entries: If the shrieker perceives a creature within 30 feet, or if an area of bright light is within 30 feet, it shrieks loudly and continuously. The shriek is audible within 300 feet. The shrieker continues to shriek for 1 minute after the creature or light has moved away.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the violet fungus is indistinguishable from a normal fungus.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fungus makes a rotting touch attack against two different creatures.

action.name: Rotting Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the gargoyle is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargoyle attacks with its bite and its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage if the gargoyle started its turn at least 20 feet above the target.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the gargoyle is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargoyle attacks with its bite and its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage if the gargoyle started its turn at least 20 feet above the target.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spit (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The gargoyle spits a stream of water 5 feet wide and 30 feet long. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage and being pushed up to 15 feet from the gargoyle on a failure. On a success, a creature takes half damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The divi's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (can assume Medium or Large form)

1e: {@spell plane shift|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (to Elemental Plane of Earth only)

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The divi deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The divi makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Crushing Hand
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the divi can't use Crushing Hand on another target and has advantage on Crushing Hand attacks against this target, and the target can't breathe.

action.name: Stone Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Quake (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Amid deafening rumbling, the ground shakes in a 10-foot radius around a point on an earth or stone surface within 90 feet. The area becomes difficult terrain. Each non-elemental creature in the area makes a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) thunder damage and falling {@condition prone} on a failure or taking half damage on a success.

bonus.name: Stone Wall (1/Day)
entries: A permanent stone wall magically rises from an earth or stone surface within 60 feet. The wall is 6 inches thick and can be up to 20 feet high and 30 feet long. If it appears in a creature's space, the creature can choose which side of the wall to move to. Each 10-foot-by-10-foot section of the wall is an object with AC 18 and 30 hit points.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The divi's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (can assume Medium or Large form)

1e: {@spell plane shift|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (to Elemental Plane of Earth only)

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The divi deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Elite Recovery (While Bloodied)
entries: At the end of each of its turns, the divi noble ends one negative effect currently affecting it. It can do so as long as it has at least 1 hit point, even while {@condition unconscious} or {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance (While Bloodied)
entries: The divi noble has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Wish (3/Year)
entries: The divi noble can cast {@spell wish|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for a mortal, using no material components.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The divi makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Crushing Hand
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the divi can't use Crushing Hand on another target and has advantage on Crushing Hand attacks against this target, and the target can't breathe.

action.name: Stone Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

Each non-elemental creature in the area makes a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) thunder damage and falling {@condition prone} on a failure or taking half damage on a success.

If it appears in a creature's space, the creature can choose which side of the wall to move to. Each 10-foot-by-10-foot section of the wall is an object with AC 18 and 30 hit points.

bonus.name: Quake (While Bloodied)
entries: The divi uses Quake.

bonus.name: Meteor Fall (While Bloodied, 1/Day)
entries: Dozens of rocks fall from the sky or ceiling. Each creature of the divi's choice within 120 feet makes a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 14d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The djinni's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (can assume Medium or Large form)

1e: {@spell plane shift|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (to Elemental Plane of Air only)

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The djinni makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 90 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Scimitar Sweep (1/Day, Giant Form Only)
entries: The djinni makes a scimitar attack against each creature of its choice within its reach.

bonus.name: Giant Form (1/Day, While Not Bloodied)
entries: The djinni magically becomes a Huge, semi-substantial creature of billowing cloud. In this form, it gains resistance to nonmagical damage, and its scimitar attacks gain a reach of 10 feet. The effect ends after 1 minute, when the djinni is {@condition incapacitated}, or if the djinni becomes bloodied.

bonus.name: Whirlwind (1/Day)
entries: A magical, 5-foot-wide, 30-foot-tall whirlwind appears in a space the djinni can see within 60 feet. The whirlwind may appear in another creature's space. If the whirlwind appears in another creature's space, or when it enters a creature's space for the first time on a turn, the creature makes a {@dc 18} Strength check, becoming {@condition restrained} by the whirlwind on a failure. The whirlwind may restrain one creature at a time. A creature within 5 feet of the whirlwind (including the {@condition restrained} creature) can use an action to make a {@dc 18} Strength check, freeing the {@condition restrained} creature on a success. A freed creature can move to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the whirlwind.

As a bonus action, the djinni can move the whirlwind up to 30 feet, moving a {@condition restrained} creature with it. The whirlwind disappears if the djinni loses sight of it, if the djinni dies or is {@condition incapacitated}, or if the djinni dismisses it as an action.

headerEntries: The djinni's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

entries: The djinni noble can cast {@spell wish|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for a mortal, using no material components.

A freed creature can move to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the whirlwind.

As a bonus action, the djinni can move the whirlwind up to 30 feet, moving a {@condition restrained} creature with it. The whirlwind disappears if the djinni loses sight of it, if the djinni dies or is {@condition incapacitated}, or if the djinni dismisses it as an action.

reaction.name: Answering Scimitar (While Bloodied)
entries: When a creature within 5 feet that the djinni can see misses the djinni noble with a melee attack, the djinni may make a scimitar attack against its attacker. The djinni then flies up to its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. At the end of this movement, the djinni can make a second scimitar attack.

reaction.name: Lightning Blast (While Bloodied)
entries: When the djinni noble takes damage, it uses Lightning Blast.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The efreeti's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (can assume Medium or Large form)

1e: {@spell plane shift|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (to Elemental Plane of Fire only)

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The efreeti makes two brass sword attacks or hurls flame twice. The efreeti can replace one attack with a kick.

action.name: Brass Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the efreeti pushes the target 10 feet away.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage.

bonus.name: Fiery Wall (1/Day)
entries: An opaque wall of magical flame rises from the ground within 60 feet. The wall is 6 inches thick and can be up to 20 feet high and 30 feet long. Each creature within the wall when it appears makes a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature also takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The wall disappears when the efreeti is killed or {@condition incapacitated}, or when it uses an action to dismiss it.

The wall disappears when the efreeti is killed or {@condition incapacitated}, or when it uses an action to dismiss it.

bonus.name: Ball of Fire (While Bloodied)
entries: Fire streaks from the efreeti to a point within 120 feet and explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere, spreading around corners. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. Unattended flammable objects in the area catch on fire.

bonus.name: Flame's Curse (While Bloodied, 1/Day)
entries: The efreeti targets a creature within 60 feet that can hear the efreeti. The target magically gains a flickering aura of flame. If the target does not have immunity or resistance to fire, it gains vulnerability to fire. If the target is immune or resistant to fire, the efreeti's fire damage ignores that immunity or resistance. This effect lasts for 1 minute or until the target is reduced to 0 hit points.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The marid's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (can assume Medium or Large form)

1e: {@spell plane shift|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (to Elemental Plane of Water only)

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The marid can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marid makes two trident attacks. One of these can be replaced with a net attack.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage. If thrown, the trident returns to the marid's hand.

action.name: Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 5/15 ft., one target. {@h}A Large, Medium, or Small target is {@condition restrained} until it is freed. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 18} Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. The net is an object with AC 10, 20 hit points, vulnerability to slashing damage, and immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage.

bonus.name: Fog Cloud (1/Day)
entries: The marid magically creates a heavily obscured area of fog (or, if underwater, inky water) in a 30-foot radius around a point it can see within 60 feet. The fog spreads around corners and can be dispersed by a moderate wind or current (at least 10 miles per hour). Otherwise, it disperses after 10 minutes. The marid can see through this fog.

bonus.name: Water Jet (While Bloodied)
entries: The marid shoots water in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long jet. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and is pushed 20 feet away from the marid, to a maximum of 60 feet away, and knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a target takes half damage.
