The fog spreads around corners and can be dispersed by a moderate wind or current (at least 10 miles per hour). Otherwise, it disperses after 10 minutes. The marid can see through this fog.

bonus.name: Water Jet (While Bloodied)
entries: The marid shoots water in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long jet. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and is pushed 20 feet away from the marid, to a maximum of 60 feet away, and knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a target takes half damage.

reaction.name: Water Jet (While Bloodied)
entries: When the marid takes damage, it uses Water Jet if it can include the attacker in the area.

monster.name: Ghost
languages: the languages it spoke in life

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The ghost can see into both the Material and Ethereal Plane.

trait.name: Incorporeal
entries: The ghost can move through creatures and objects. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A ghost doesn't require air, sustenance, or sleep.

trait.name: Unquiet Spirit
entries: If defeated in combat, the ghost returns in 24 hours. It can be put to rest permanently only by finding and casting {@spell remove curse|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} on its remains or by resolving the unfinished business that keeps it from journeying to the afterlife.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) necrotic damage. If the target is {@condition frightened}, it is magically aged {@dice 1d4} x 10 years. The aging effect can be reversed with a {@spell greater restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} spell.

action.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: The ghost magically shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice versa. If it wishes, it can be visible to creatures on one plane while on the other.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet and on the same plane of existence that can see the ghost makes a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, it is immune to the ghost's Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

action.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
entries: One humanoid within 5 feet makes a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is possessed by the ghost. The possessed creature is {@condition unconscious}. The ghost enters the creature's body and takes control of it. The ghost can be targeted only by effects that turn undead, and it retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma. It grants its host body immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. It otherwise uses the possessed creature's statistics and actions instead of its own. It doesn't gain access to the creature's memories but does gain access to proficiencies, nonmagical class features and traits, and nonmagical actions. It can't use limited-use abilities or class traits that require spending a resource. The possession ends after 24 hours, when the body drops to 0 hit points, when the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or when the ghost is turned or affected by {@spell dispel evil and good|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or a similar effect. Additionally, the possessed creature repeats its saving throw whenever it takes damage. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in a space within 5 feet of the body. A creature is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on its saving throw or after the possession ends.

action.name: Drain Heat
entries: The ghost magically drains the heat from a 15-foot-radius area around it. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage on a failure or half damage on a success. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage can't regain hit points until the start of the ghost's next turn.

action.name: Pyrokinesis
entries: The ghost magically ignites up to three flammable, unattended, nonmagical objects it can see within 30 feet. Each creature within 5 feet of an object when it ignites makes a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Spew Ectoplasm
entries: The ghost vomits a spray of ectoplasm in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a success, the creature is {@condition rattled|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the end of its next turn. On a failure, the creature is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Telekinetic Shove
entries: The ghost targets one Large or smaller creature within 60 feet. THe target makes a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the ghost magically moves the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including upward. If the target strikes and object, such as a wall, it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage and falls {@condition prone}. If the target would strike another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: If the ghost takes damage from an attack or spell, it uses Horrifying Visage.

monster.name: Vengeful Ghost
languages: the languages it spoke in life

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The ghost can see into both the Material and Ethereal Plane.

trait.name: Incorporeal
entries: The ghost can move through creatures and objects. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: A ghost doesn't require air, sustenance, or sleep.

trait.name: Unquiet Spirit
entries: If defeated in combat, the ghost returns in 24 hours. It can be put to rest permanently only by finding and casting {@spell remove curse|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} on its remains or by resolving the unfinished business that keeps it from journeying to the afterlife.

trait.name: Graveborn Strength
entries: When not in sunlight, creatures make their saving throws against the ghost's Horrifying Visage and Possession abilities with disadvantage.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) necrotic damage. If the target is {@condition frightened}, it is magically aged {@dice 1d4} x 10 years. The aging effect can be reversed with a {@spell greater restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} spell.

action.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: The ghost magically shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice versa. If it wishes, it can be visible to creatures on one plane while on the other.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet and on the same plane of existence that can see the ghost makes a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, it is immune to the ghost's Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

action.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
entries: One humanoid within 5 feet makes a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it is possessed by the ghost. The possessed creature is {@condition unconscious}. The ghost enters the creature's body and takes control of it. The ghost can be targeted only by effects that turn undead, and it retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma. It grants its host body immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. It otherwise uses the possessed creature's statistics and actions instead of its own. It doesn't gain access to the creature's memories but does gain access to proficiencies, nonmagical class features and traits, and nonmagical actions. It can't use limited-use abilities or class traits that require spending a resource. The possession ends after 24 hours, when the body drops to 0 hit points, when the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or when the ghost is turned or affected by {@spell dispel evil and good|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or a similar effect. Additionally, the possessed creature repeats its saving throw whenever it takes damage. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in a space within 5 feet of the body. A creature is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on its saving throw or after the possession ends.

action.name: Drain Heat
entries: The ghost magically drains the heat from a 15-foot-radius area around it. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage on a failure or half damage on a success. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage can't regain hit points until the start of the ghost's next turn.

action.name: Pyrokinesis
entries: The ghost magically ignites up to three flammable, unattended, nonmagical objects it can see within 30 feet. Each creature within 5 feet of an object when it ignites makes a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

action.name: Spew Ectoplasm
entries: The ghost vomits a spray of ectoplasm in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a success, the creature is {@condition rattled|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the end of its next turn. On a failure, the creature is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Telekinetic Shove
entries: The ghost targets one Large or smaller creature within 60 feet. THe target makes a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the ghost magically moves the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including upward. If the target strikes and object, such as a wall, it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage and falls {@condition prone}. If the target would strike another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: If the ghost takes damage from an attack or spell, it uses Horrifying Visage.

trait.name: Radiant Sensitivity
entries: When the ghoul takes radiant damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Perception checks that rely on sight until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Staggering Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage. If the target is a living creature other than an elf, it makes a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition staggered|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, it is immune to any Staggering Claw for 24 hours.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition staggered|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition staggered|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Stench
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the ghast makes a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a success, it is immune to any ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Turning Defiance
entries: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 feet make saving throws against being turned with advantage.

entries: Clouds and fog do not impair the giant's vision.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The giant has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it makes a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed up to 10 feet away from the giant and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}39 ({@damage 9d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it makes a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

entries: One creature within 10 feet makes a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed up to 30 feet away from the giant.

action.name: Reverse Gravity (1/Day)
entries: Each creature of the giant's choice within 30 feet is magically hurled 60 feet in the air. If a creature hits an obstacle, it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage. The creatures then fall, taking falling damage as normal.

action.name: Silver Tongue (1/Day)
entries: One creature that can hear the giant within 30 feet makes a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is magically {@condition charmed} by the giant for 1 hour. This effect ends if the giant or its allies harm the creature.

action.name: Pillar of Flame (1/Day)
entries: Each creature within a 10-foot-radius, 40-foor-high cylinder centred on a point within 60 feet that the fire giant can see makes a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 ({@damage 16d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. Unattended flammable objects are ignited.

trait.name: Fire Fear
entries: When the giant takes fire damage, it is {@condition rattled|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Battleaxe

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The giant can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The giant has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant attacks twice with its greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}44 ({@damage 10d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it makes a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

action.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The giant throws a lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of that point makes a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 ({@damage 16d6}) lightning damage on a success or half the damage on a failure.

action.name: Sword Sweep (While Bloodied)
entries: The giant makes a greatsword attack against each creature within 10 feet. Each creature hit with this attack makes a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

bonus.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller {@condition prone} target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Elite Recovery (While Bloodied)
entries: The giant ends one negative effect currently affecting it. It can do so as long as it has at least 1 hit point, even while {@condition unconscious} or {@condition incapacitated}.

bonus.name: Lightning Sword (While Bloodied)
entries: The giant moves or swims up to its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks and makes a greatsword attack. On a hit, the target takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) extra lightning damage.

bonus.name: Lightning Strikes (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: The giant recharges and uses Lightning Strike.

bonus.name: Twister (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: A Large or smaller creature the giant can see within 120 feet makes a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) bludgeoning damage and is caught within a whirlwind or water funnel and {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. On a success, it takes half damage. A creature can use an action to make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw, freeing itself or a creature within its reach from the twister on a success.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The mouther can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Gibbering Mouths
entries: A living non-aberration creature that starts its turn within 30 feet and can hear its gibbering makes a {@dc 10} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition confused|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Reality Eater
entries: The ground within 15 feet of the mouther is the consistency of sucking mud and is difficult terrain to all creatures except the mouther. Each non-aberrant creature that starts its turn in the area or enters it for the first time on its turn makes a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw. On a failure, its Speed is reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mouther makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage, and the target makes a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure. If the target is killed by this attack, it is absorbed into the mouther.

bonus.name: Blinding Bile (Recharge 5-6)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage, and the target is {@condition blinded} until the end of the mouther's next turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The worm can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Locate Mind
entries: The worm is aware of the location and relative intelligence of all creatures with Intelligence scores greater than 3 within 500 feet. For example, it knows whether a creature is smarter than, as smart as, or less smart than itself.

trait.name: Maddening Murmurs
entries: A non-aberrant creature that starts its turn within 30 feet and can hear its murmurs makes a {@dc 14} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage and is {@condition confused|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The worm constricts once and attacks once with its bite.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) and {@condition restrained} while {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is killed by this attack, the worm eats its head.

bonus.name: Mental Summons
entries: One creature with an Intelligence score greater than 3 within 120 feet makes a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it uses its reaction to move up to its Speed towards the worm by the shortest route possible, avoiding hazards but not opportunity attacks. This is a magical {@condition charmed||charm} effect.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The gnoll has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the gnoll's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Rampaging Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one bloodied creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The gnoll has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the gnoll's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnoll attacks twice with its spear.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Rampaging Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one bloodied creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The gnoll has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the gnoll's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Rampaging Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one bloodied creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Aligned
entries: The gnoll radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

trait.name: Possessed
entries: If the gnoll demonfang is turned or affected by {@condition dispel evil and good|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or a similar effect, it transforms into an ordinary gnoll. Any damage it has taken carries over to its new form. If this damage exceeds its macimum hit points, it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnoll attacks three times with its Charging Claw.

action.name: Charging Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage if this is the gnoll's first attack on this target this turn. The gnoll may then move up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin takes the Disengage or Hide action.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Throw Vial (2/Day)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 20/40 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) ongoing fire or acid damage (either acid or alchemist's fire). A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage on a target.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin takes the Disengage or Hide action.

action.name: Sabre
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin takes the Disengage or Hide action.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Prepare Musket
entries: This action can be taken by either the goblin or another goblin within 5 feet of it. This goblin is able to make Musket attacks during its next turn.

action.name: Musket
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target while the musket is prepared. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin takes the Disengage or Hide action.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shield Wall
entries: The goblin and a goblin within 5 feet of it gain three-quarters cover.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin takes the Disengage or Hide action.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: The goblin deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when it attacks with advantage or when one of its allies is within 5 feet of its target and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin takes the Disengage or Hide action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin attacks twice with its scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Command Minions
entries: Up to 3 goblins within 30 feet that can hear or see it use their reactions to make a single melee attack each.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin takes the Disengage or Hide action.

action.name: Warlock Actions
entries: The goblin has 3 of the following actions.

items.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

items.name: Silver Fire
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) ongoing fire damage. A creature can use an action to douse the fire on a target, ending the ongoing damage.

items.name: Clinging Illusion
entries: The warlock creates a magical illusion of an unmoving Medium or smaller object in a space it can see within 30 feet. The illusion can hide a smaller object in the same space. The illusion lasts 24 hours, until a creature touches it, or until the warlock uses Clinging Illusion again. A creature can take an action to make a {@dc 12} Investigation check to disbelieve the illusion. On a success, the illusion appears transparent to the creature.

items.name: Last Restort (1/Week)
entries: The warlock touches a willing goblin ally and permanently turns it into a hobgoblin or bugbear.

items.name: Surprise Sacrifice
entries: A living goblin ally the warlock can see within 60 feet explodes, dying instantly. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding goblin makes a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

items.name: Turn Weapon
entries: A nonmgical melee weapon the warlock can see within 60 feet attacks the creature wielding it. The weapon makes a melee weapon attack with a +5 bonus, and deals damage as if wielded by a creature with Strength and Dexterity scores of 16 (+3).

reaction.name: Quick Switch
entries: When the warlock is hit by an attack, it magically teleports, switching places with a goblin ally within 30 feet. The goblin ally is hit by the triggering attack and suffers its effects.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target makes a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure. If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack, the attack deals an extra 6 ({@damage 1d12}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Petrifying Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition restrained} as it begins to turn to stone. At the start of the gorgon's next turn, the creature repeats the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified}. This petrification can be removed with {@spell greater restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or similar magic.

bonus.name: Trample Underfoot
entries: The gorgon attacks a {@condition prone} creature with its hooves.

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The grick has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The grick can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the grick can't attack a different target with its tentacles.

bonus.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature {@condition grappled} by the grick. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Luring Scent
entries: When a beast, humanoid, or fey creature begins its turn within 30 feet, the creature makes a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it moves as close as it can to the wallflower and ends its turn. Creatures immune to being {@condition charmed} are immune to this effect. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Luring Scent of all wallflowers for 24 hours.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The wallflower can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the wallflower can't attack a different target with its tentacles.

bonus.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature {@condition grappled} by the wallflower. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The grick has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The grick can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature it makes a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the creature is pulled to within 5 feet of the grick and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until the {@condition grappled} ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}. The grick can {@condition grapple} up to two Medium or smaller creatures or one Large creature.

bonus.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature {@condition grappled} by the grick. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon attacks once with its beak and once with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage, or 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage if the griffon started its turn at least 20 feet above the target, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the griffon can't attack a different target with its talons.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The lion has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lion attacks once with its bite and once with its talons.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage, or 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage if the lion started its turn at least 20 feet above the target, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the lion can't attack a different target with its talons.

monster.name: Grimlock
senses: blindsight 30 ft., or 10 ft. while {@condition deafened} (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Spiked Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Throttle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}) and can't breathe. Until this grapple ends, the grimlock can't use any attack other than throttle and only against the {@condition grappled} target, and it makes this attack with advantage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Grimlock Technical

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Stick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Silenced Blunderbuss
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage. The blunderbuss fires with a cloud of smoke and a quiet pop that can be heard from 30 feet away. It requires an action to reload the blunderbuss.

action.name: Smoke Bomb (3/Day)
entries: The grimlock throws a vial at a point up to 20 feet away. The area within 30 feet of that point is heavily obscured for 1 minute or until cleared by a strong wind.

monster.name: Revilock
senses: blindsight 30 ft., or 10 ft. while {@condition deafened} (blind beyond this radius)

spellcasting.name: Psionic Spellcasting
headerEntries: The revilock's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: The revilock has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The revilock has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Spiked Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Throttle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}) and can't breathe. Until this grapple ends, the revilock can't use any attack other than throttle and only against the {@condition grappled} target, and it makes this attack with advantage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Psychic Camouflage
entries: When the revilock would be targeted by an attack or spell, the attack makes a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw if the revilock can sense it with its blindsense. On a failure, the attacker momentarily forgets the revilock's existence. The attacker must choose a new target or a different action that doesn't target the revilock. Creatures with telepathy or an Intelligence of 3 or less are immune to this effect.

reaction.name: Shared Pain
entries: When the revilock takes damage from an attack or spell, the attacker or spellcaster makes a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw if the revilock can sense it with its blindsense, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage on a failure. Creatures with telepathy make the saving throw with disadvantage.

monster.name: Clay Guardian
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Acid Absorption
entries: When the guardian is subjected to acid damage, it instead regains hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

trait.name: Berserk
entries: When the guardian starts its turn while bloodied, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the guardian goes berserk. While berserk, the guardian attacks the nearest creature it can see. If it can't reach a creature, it attacks an object. The guardian stays berserk until it is destroyed or restored to full hit points.

trait.name: Bloodied Haste
entries: While the guardian is bloodied, its speed is doubled, it gains a +2 bonus to AC, it has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it can use its slam as a bonus action.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guardian attacks twice with its slam.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it makes a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage dealt. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. A {@spell greater restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} spell or similar magic removes the reduction.

monster.name: Flesh Guardian
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: When the guardian is subjected to lightning damage, it instead regains hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Berserk
entries: When the guardian starts its turn while bloodied, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the guardian goes berserk. While berserk, the guardian attacks the nearest creature it can see. If it can't reach a creature, it attacks an object. The guardian stays berserk until it is destroyed or restored to full hit points.
If a berserk guardian can see and hear its creator, the creator can use an action to try to calm it by making a {@dc 15} Persuasion check. On a success, the guardian is no longer berserk.

trait.name: Fire Fear
entries: When the guardian takes fire damage, it is {@condition rattled|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guardian attacks twice with its slam.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hurl Object
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: An 80-foot-long, 5-foot-wide lightning bolt springs from the guardian's chest. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

monster.name: Hound Guardian
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The guardian has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature it makes a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

reaction.name: Protective Bite
entries: When a creature within 5 feet hits the guardian's owner with a melee attack, the guardian bites the attacker.

monster.name: Iron Guardian
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: When the guardian is subjected to fire damage, it instead regains hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guardian makes two sword attacks.

action.name: Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The guardian exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot-cone. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Deflection
entries: When missed by a ranged attack by a creature the guardian can see, the guardian redirects the attack against a creature within 60 feet that it can see. The original attacker must reroll the attack against the new target.

monster.name: Shield Guardian
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Amulet
entries: The guardian is magically bound to an amulet. It knows the distance and direction to the amulet while it is on the same plane of existence. Whoever wears the amulet becomes the guardian's master and can magically command the guardian to travel to it.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Spell Storing
entries: A spellcaster wearing the guardian's amulet can use the guardian to store a spell. The spellcaster casts a spell using a 4th-level or lower spell slot on the guardian, choosing any spell parameters. The spell has no effect when thus cast. The guardian can cast this spell once, using no components, when ordered to do so by its master or under other predefined circumstances. When a spell is stored in the guardian, any previously stored spell is lost.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guardian attacks twice with its fist.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Self-Repair
entries: The guardian regains 15 hit points.

reaction.name: Absorb Damage
entries: If the guardian is within 60 feet of its master when the master takes damage, half the damage (rounded up) is transferred to the guardian.

reaction.name: Shield
entries: If the guardian is within 5 feet of its master when the master is attacked, the guardian grants a +3 bonus to its master's AC.

monster.name: Stone Guardian
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The guardian is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guardian attacks twice with its slam.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 7d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. The target makes a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

bonus.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The guardian targets one or more creatures within 30 feet. Each target makes a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition slowed|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Stone Colossus
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The colossus has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The colossus is immune to any effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the colossus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, it crumbles and cracks, losing 20 hit points.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The colossus attacks twice with its slam.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 7d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. The target makes a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

bonus.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The colossus targets one or more creatures within 30 feet. Each target makes a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition slowed|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Seize
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d4 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the colossus can't seize a different creature.

legendary.name: Fling
entries: The colossus throws one Large or smaller object or creature it is grappling up to 60 feet. The target lands {@condition prone} and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the colossus throws the target at another creature, that creature makes a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking the same damage on a failure.

legendary.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it makes a {@dc 18} Strength check, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

legendary.name: Bolt from the Blue (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: If the colossus is outside, it calls a bolt of energy down from the sky, hitting a point on the ground or water within 120 feet. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, sky-high cylinder centered on that point makes a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. The colossus can choose to make the bolt deal fire or radiant damage instead of lightning.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic voices and animal sounds. Recognising the sounds as imitation requires a {@dc 13} Insight check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag attacks with its claws and uses Hex.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hex (Gaze)
entries: A creature within 60 feet that is not already under a hag's hex makes a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. A creature under an obligation to the hag automatically fails this saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target is cursed with a magical hex that lasts 30 days. The curse ends early if the target suffers harm from the hag or if the hag ends it as an action. Roll {@dice 1d4}:

items.name: 1. Charm Hex
entries: The target is {@condition charmed} by the hag.

items.name: 2. Fear Hex
entries: The target is {@condition frightened} of the hag.

items.name: 3. Ill Fortune Hex
entries: The hag magically divines the target's activities. Whenever the target attempts a long-duration task such as a craft, downtime, or journey activity, the hag can cause the activity to fail.

items.name: 4. Sleep Hex
entries: The target falls {@condition unconscious}. The curse ends early if the target takes damage or if a creature uses an action to shake it awake.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic voices and animal sounds. Recognising the sounds as imitation requires a {@dc 13} Insight check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag attacks with its claws and then uses Hex if not in beast form.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hex (Gaze)

On a failed saving throw, the target is cursed with a magical hex that lasts 30 days. The curse ends early if the target suffers harm from the hag or if the hag ends it as an action. Roll {@dice 1d4}:

items.name: 1. Charm Hex
entries: The target is {@condition charmed} by the hag.

items.name: 2. Fear Hex
entries: The target is {@condition frightened} of the hag.

items.name: 3. Ill Fortune Hex
entries: The hag magically divines the target's activities. Whenever the target attempts a long-duration task such as a craft, downtime, or journey activity, the hag can cause the activity to fail.

items.name: 4. Sleep Hex
entries: The target falls {@condition unconscious}. The curse ends early if the target takes damage or if a creature uses an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Beast Form
entries: The hag magically transforms into a Large or smaller beast or back into its true form. While in beast form, it retains its game statistics, can't cast spells, can't use Hex, and can't speak. The hag's Speed increases by 10 feet, and when appropriate to its beast form it gains a climb, fly, or swim speed of 40 feet. Any equipment the hag is wearing or wielding merges into its new form.

trait.name: Curse
entries: A creature touched by the hag's claws is magically cursed for 30 days. While under this curse, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls made against the hag.

trait.name: Evil
entries: The hag radiates an Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target is subject to the hag's Curse trait.

action.name: Sleep Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}The target falls {@condition unconscious||asleep} for 4 hours or until it takes damage or is shaken awake. Once the hag successfully hits a target, it can't make this attack again until it finishes a long rest.

action.name: Shapeshift
entries: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid. Equipment it is carrying isn't transformed. It retains its claws in any form. It has no true form and remains in its current form when it dies.

action.name: Planar Travel (3/Day)
entries: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. Alternatively, the hag is magically transported to the Material Plane, Hell, or the Abyss, arriving within 10 miles of its desired destination.

action.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day)
entries: While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag magically touches a sleeping creature that is under the night hag's Curse and is not protected by a magic circle or {@spell protection from evil and good|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} spell or similar magic. As long as the touch persists, the target has terrible nightmares. If the nightmares last for 1 hour, the target gains a level of {@condition strife|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} and gains no benefit from the rest, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 ({@damage 1d10}) until the curse ends. If this effect reduces the target's hit points maximum to 0, the target dies and the hag captures its soul. The reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until removed by {@spell greater restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or similar magic.

trait.name: Curse
entries: A creature touched by the hag's claws is magically cursed for 30 days. While under this curse, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls made against the hag.

trait.name: Evil
entries: The hag radiates an Evil aura.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

As long as the touch persists, the target has terrible nightmares. If the nightmares last for 1 hour, the target gains a level of {@condition strife|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} and gains no benefit from the rest, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 ({@damage 1d10}) until the curse ends. If this effect reduces the target's hit points maximum to 0, the target dies and the hag captures its soul. The reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until removed by {@spell greater restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or similar magic.

bonus.name: Fragmentary Dream
entries: The hag creates a terrifying illusion visible only to one creature that it can see within 120 feet. The creature makes a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. It takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage and becomes {@condition frightened} of the hag until the end of its turn on a failure, or takes half damage on a success.

reaction.name: Steal Magic (3/Day)
entries: When a creature the hag can see within 60 feet casts a spell using a 3rd-level or lower spell slot, the hag attempts to steal its power. The caster makes a {@dc 14} saving throw using its spellcasting ability. On a failure, the spell fails, and the hag gains 5 ({@damage 1d10}) temporary hit points per level of the spell slot used.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Curse
entries: A creature that makes a bargain with the hag is magically cursed for 30 days. While it is cursed, the target automatically fails saving throws against the hag's {@spell scrying|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} and {@spell geas|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} spells, and the hag can cast {@spell control weather|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} centered on the creature.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe air and water.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Death Glare (Gaze)
entries: One {@condition frightened} creature within 30 feet makes a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, the creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

bonus.name: Horrific Transformation
entries: The hag briefly takes on a terrifying form or reveals its true form. Each creature within 30 feet that can see the hag makes a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. A creature under the hag's curse automatically fails this saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition frightened} of the hag until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, it is immune to the hag's Horrific Transformation for 24 hours.

entries: A creature that accepts a gift from the hag is magically cursed for 30 days. While it is cursed, the target automatically fails saving throws against the hag's {@spell charm person|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}, {@spell geas|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}, and {@spell scrying|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} spells, and the hag can cast {@spell control weather|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} centered on the creature.

trait.name: Icy Travel
entries: The hag is not hindered by cold weather, icy surfaces, snow, wind, or storms. Additionally, the hag and her allies leave no trace when walking on snow or ice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag attacks once with its claws and once with its ice bolt.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Ice Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) cold damage, and the target makes a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. A creature under the hag's curse automatically fails this saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition restrained} as it begins to turn to ice. At the end of the creature's next turn, the creature repeats the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} into ice. This petrification can be removed with {@spell greater restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or similar magic.

action.name: Shapeshift
entries: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Equipment it is carrying isn't transformed. It retains a streak of white hair in any form. It returns to its true form if it dies.

reaction.name: Ice Shield
entries: The hag adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it made by a creature it can see. If the attack misses, the attacker takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage.

headerEntries: The hag's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1e: {@spell wall of ice|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} (line shape only, up to 50 feet long and 20 feet high, sections are immune to cold, poison, and psychic damage)

entries: The hag adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it made by a creature it can see. If the attack misses, the attacker takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The veteran makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The veteran exhales a blast of fire that fills a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature who fails the saving throw also suffers 5 ({@damage 1d10}) ongoing fire damage. At the end of each of its turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the ongoing damage on a success. This fire can also be put out in typical ways, such as immersion in water, and a creature who uses an action to drop {@condition prone} can put out the fire with a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw.

bonus.name: Tactical Movement
entries: Until the end of the veteran's turn, its Speed is halved and its movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Off-Hand Counter
entries: When the veteran is missed by a melee attack by an attacker it can see within 5 feet, the veteran makes a shortsword attack against the attacker.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During the first turn of combat, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't acted. On a successful hit, each creature of the assassin's choice that can see the assassin's attack is {@condition rattled|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the end of the assassin's next turn.

trait.name: Dangerous Poison
entries: As part of making an attack, the assassin can apply a dangrous poison to their weapon (included below). The assassin carries 3 doses of this poison. A single dose can coat one melee weapon or up to 5 pieces of ammunition.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: When the assassin makes a Dexterity saving throw against an effect that deals half damage on a success, they take no damage on a success and half damage on a failure.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The assassin deals an extra 21 ({@damage 6d6}) damage when they hit with a weapon attack while they have advantage on the attack, or when the assassin's target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin while the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Anguished Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The assassin exhales a shadowy maelstrom of anguish in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The assassin takes the Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action.

bonus.name: Rapid Attack
entries: The assassin attacks with their shortsword.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The harpy attacks twice with its claw.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Luring Song
entries: The harpy sings a magical song. Each humanoid and giant within 300 feet that can hear it makes a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature becomes {@condition charmed} until the harpy fails to use its bonus action to continue the song. While {@condition charmed} by the harpy, a creature is {@condition dazed|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} and ignores other harpy songs. On each of its turns, the creature moves towards the harpy by the most direct route, not avoiding opportunity attacks or hazards. The creature repeats its saving throw whenever it is damaged and before it enters damaging terrain such as lava. If a saving throw is successful or the effect ends on it, it is immune to any harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The siren can breathe and sing both in air and underwater.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The siren attacks twice with its claw.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Luring Song
entries: The siren sings a magical song. Each humanoid and giant within 300 feet that can hear it makes a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature becomes {@condition charmed} until the siren fails to use its bonus action to continue the song. While {@condition charmed} by the siren, a creature is {@condition dazed|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} and ignores other siren songs. On each of its turns, the creature moves towards the siren by the most direct route, not avoiding opportunity attacks or hazards. The creature repeats its saving throw whenever it is damaged and before it enters damaging terrain such as lava. If a saving throw is successful or the effect ends on it, it is immune to any siren's song for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The hound has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.

trait.name: Lawful Evil
entries: The hound radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hound has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The hound exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The hippogriff has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Formation Movement
entries: If the hobgoblin begins its turn within 5 feet of an ally that is not {@condition incapacitated}, its movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) slashing damage if within 5 feet of an ally that is not {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Formation Movement
entries: If the hobgoblin begins its turn within 5 feet of an ally that is not {@condition incapacitated}, its movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin attacks twice with its greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Officer's Command (1/Day)
entries: The hobgoblin inspires creatures of its choice within 30 feet that can hear and understand it and that have a Challenge Rating of 2 or lower. For the next minute, inspired creatures gain an expertise die ({@dice 1d4}) on attack rolls and saving throws. A creature can benefit from only one Officer's Command at a time.

trait.name: Formation Movement
entries: If the hobgoblin begins its turn within 5 feet of an ally that is not {@condition incapacitated}, its movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Bloodied Rage
entries: While bloodied, the warlord can attack four times with its greatsword or twice with its javelin when it uses Multiattack but no longer gains the benefit of its Military Training trait.

trait.name: Elite Recovery (While Bloodied)
entries: At the end of each of its turns, the hobgoblin can end one condition or effect on itself. It can do so as long as it has at least 1 hit point, even when {@condition unconscious} or {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Military Training
entries: The hobgoblin has advantage on ability checks to make a tactical, strategic, or political decision.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin attacks twice with its greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Officer's Command (1/Day)
entries: The hobgoblin inspires creatures of its choice within 30 feet that can hear and understand it and that have a Challenge Rating of 2 or lower. For the next minute, inspired creatures gain an expertise die ({@dice 1d4}) on attack rolls and saving throws. A creature can benefit from only one Officer's Command at a time.

monster.name: Homunculus
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While they are on the same plane, the homunculus and its creator can communicate telepathically at any distance.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target makes a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is {@condition poisoned}. At the end of its next turn, it repeats the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, it falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. If it takes damage or a creature uses an action to shake it awake, it wakes up, and the {@condition poisoned} effect ends.

bonus.name: Bonus
entries: Entries

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifice
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the thrall that the thrall can see hits an aboleth with an attack, the thrall can make itself the target of the attack instead.

legendary.name: Legendary action
entries: Entries for legendary action

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The hydra can hold is breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the hydra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, its head lose coordination. It is {@condition rattled|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: While the hydra has more than one head, it has advantage on Perception checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition debilitated|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}, and it can't be flanked.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head it has, the hydra can take one reaction per round, but not more than one per turn.

trait.name: Regenerating Heads
entries: The hydra has five heads. Whenever the hydra takes 25 or more damage in one turn, one of its heads dies. If all of its heads die, the hydra dies. At the end of its turn, it grows 2 heads for each head that was killed since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn.

trait.name: Toxic Secretions
entries: Water within 1 mile of the hydra's lair is poisoned. A creature other than the hydra that is immersed in the water or drinks the water makes a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours. On a success, the creature is immune to this poison for 24 hours.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: When some of the hydra's heads are asleep, others are awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hydra bites once with each of its heads.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Rush
entries: The hydra moves or swims up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If this movement would pass through the space of creatures that are not {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}, each creature makes a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the creature is knocked {@condition prone} and the hydra can enter its space without treating it as difficult terrain. On a success, the hydra can't enter the creature's space, and the hydra's movement ends. If this movement ends while the hydra is sharing a space with a creature, the creature is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space.

legendary.name: Wrap
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) and {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends. The hydra can grapple one creature for each of its heads. When one of the hydra's heads is killed while it grappling a creature, the creature that killed the head can choose one creature to free from the grapple.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The hydra can hold is breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the hydra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, its head lose coordination. It is {@condition rattled|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head it has, the hydra can take one reaction per round, but not more than one per turn.

trait.name: Regenerating Heads
entries: The hydra has seven heads. Whenever the hydra takes 30 or more damage in one turn, one of its heads dies. If all of its heads die, the hydra dies. At the end of its turn, it grows 2 heads for each head that was killed since its last turn, unless it has taken at least 20 cold damage since its last turn.

trait.name: Toxic Secretions

On a failure, the creature is {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours. On a success, the creature is immune to this poison for 24 hours.

entries: The hydra bites once with each of its heads.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: If the pyrohydra has at least four heads, it breathes fire in all directions. Each creature within 30 feet makes a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 59 ({@damage 17d6}) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

If this movement would pass through the space of creatures that are not {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}, each creature makes a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the creature is knocked {@condition prone} and the hydra can enter its space without treating it as difficult terrain. On a success, the hydra can't enter the creature's space, and the hydra's movement ends. If this movement ends while the hydra is sharing a space with a creature, the creature is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space.

The hydra can grapple one creature for each of its heads. When one of the hydra's heads is killed while it grappling a creature, the creature that killed the head can choose one creature to free from the grapple.

monster.name: Intellect Devourer
languages: understands deep speech but can't speak

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The intellect devourer attacks with its claws and uses Ego Whip.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target gains one level of {@condition strife|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}. If this attack causes the target to reach 3 levels of {@condition strife|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}, the target loses all memories of its past life (not including proficiencies, class features, known spells, and so on) and the intellect devourer gains these memories. A creature regains its memories if it is subject to {@spell greater restoration|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or the intellect devourer is killed.

action.name: Ego Whip
entries: The intellect devourer targets a creature with a brain within 60 feet. The target makes a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage and is {@condition rattled|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} for 1 minute. If it is already {@condition rattled|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} by Ego Whip, it is also {@condition debilitated|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E}. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending both effects on a success.

action.name: Body Thief
entries: The intellect devourer enters the nose and mouth of an {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition debilitated|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} humanoid within 5 feet. The target must be Small or larger, have a brain, and have an Intelligence of 4 or higher. The intellect devourer eats the target's brain and takes control of the target. The intellect devourer leaves the body if the target is reduced to 0 hit points, if the target is affected by {@spell dispel evil and good|LevelUpAdventurersGuideA5E} or another effect that ends possession, or voluntarily as a bonus action.

While the intellect devourer is in control of the target, the intellect devourer retains its own Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma, its telepathy, and its knowledge of Deep Speech. It otherwise uses the target's statistics, including proficiencies, languages, class features, and spells. It has vague knowledge about the target's life but must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence check to recall specific facts.

trait.name: Invisiblity
entries: The stalker is {@condition invisible}. Creatures that can see {@condition invisible} creatures see the stalker as a vague humanoid outline.

trait.name: Wind Tracker
entries: If given a quarry by a summoner, the stalker knows the direction and distance to the quarry as long as they are on the same plane of existence and not sealed from each other by a barrier that doesn't allow air to pass.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stalker makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. On a critical hit, the target is pushed up to 15 feet and knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Gust (Recharge 6)
entries: The stalker briefly turns into a gust of wind and moves up to its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It is able to pass through an opening as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Invisiblity
entries: The render is {@condition invisible}. Creatures that can see {@condition invisible} creatures see the render as a vague canine outline.

trait.name: Wind Tracker
entries: If given a quarry by a summoner, the render knows the direction and distance to the quarry as long as they are on the same plane of existence and not sealed from each other by a barrier that doesn't allow air to pass.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The render has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the render's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The render makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d12 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it makes a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Gust (Recharge 6)
entries: The render briefly turns into a gust of wind and moves up to its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It is able to pass through an opening as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
